name: Yuuya
text: Hah... Hah...

name: Woman
text: Stop...

name: Woman
text: P-Please, *spare* me...

name: Woman
text: Or, at least my *children...*

name: Yuuya
text:
Hey...
Why do you *only* get so angry *with
me?*

name: Yuuya
text:
Hey...
Why do you always have to *hit me?*

name: Yuuya
text: Even though you used to be *so kind...*

name: Yuuya
text:
Hey! Go back to being *the mother you
used to be!*

name: Woman
text:
Wh-What are you talking about? 
I'm not your *mother...*

name: Yuuya
text: Enough, look me *in the eyes!*
*I'm alive!*

name: Woman
text: Ghh...

name: Yuuya
text: M-Mother?

name: Yuuya
text: Why aren't you saying anything?

name: Yuuya
text:
Are you going to *leave me all alone*
again? Mother...

name: Yuuya
text: Mother...

name: Yuuya
text:
Ahh. I see.
You must be *asleep...*

name: Yuuya
text:
I'm sorry.
It must have really *hurt...*

name: Yuuya
text: But... right now, I'm so *warm.*

name: Yuuya
text:
I feel like I'm being *hugged by
Mother.*

name: Yuuya
text:
What a pleasant feeling...
Being surrounded by Mother's
warmth...

name: Yuuya
text:
This is the first time I've felt this
*happy.*
[Shake, shake]

name: Yuuya
text: Are those... *sheep?*

name: Yuuya
text:
There are *sheep* behind the door...
What are *sheep* doing in a place like
this..?

name: Yuuya
text: Eh, whatever...

name: Yuuya
text: Ahh... I'm finally *satisfied...*

name: Yuuya
text: If I died right now...
*[Crunch]*

name: Yuuya
text: This was *what* I was born for.

name: Yuuya
text: I feel like I finally understand now...

name: Yuuya
text: I... I wanted to be *loved by someone...*

name: Yuuya
text: That's all I needed...

name: Yuuya
text: *I'm so happy.*

name: Me
text: Where... am I?

name: Me
text:
When I came to, I was in a *dark place,*
and sitting in a *chair...*

name: Me
text:
I... somehow feel like *someone else
is in here with me...*

name: Me
text: What's going on..?

name: Me
text:
Then, suddenly...
I heard *someone's voice.*

name: Mysterious Girl
text: Is someone there?

name: Me
text:
Judging by her voice, she must be *a
girl around my age...*

name: Me
text:
Yes...
I'm right here.

name: Mysterious Girl
text:
A-Are you the *criminal* who kidnapped
me?

name: Me
text:
No, I'm not!
I just *woke up and found myself here!*

name: Me
text:
I think... we're probably in the *same
situation...*

name: Mysterious Girl
text:
O-Oh, I see...
Then... do you have any idea *what's
going on?*

name: Me
text: About that... I'm at a loss, really...

name: Mysterious Girl
text: *I can't see anything, it's so dark...*

name: Me
text: Y-Yeah.

name: Mysterious Girl
text:
How about *we* try to look for a *light
switch?*

name: Me
text: U-Um...

name: Mysterious Girl
text:
It's *scary* to just wander around *in the
dark,* isn't it?

name: Me
text:
Y-Yeah, it is...
(In this darkness, we have no idea if
there might be traps around...)

name: Mysterious Girl
text: How about *I start* looking around?

name: Me
text:
Well, about that...
*Something feels off...*

name: Mysterious Girl
text: Don't *worry♪*

name: Mysterious Girl
text:
Just *whenever you're ready,* I'd love
for you to *help me look around too♪*

name: Me
text: A-Alright, thank you...
[Step, step...]

The mysterious girl stood up and
*walked around the room.*

name: Me
text:
(She sure has no problem walking
around in this darkness...)

name: Me
text:
I know I should get to *helping her
look,* but... my fear is stopping me,
and I find myself unable to stand...
[Step, step...]

name: Me
text:
*I can *hear her footsteps.
She's slowly *coming towards me.*
[Step, step...]

name: Me
text:
I can hear her footsteps come *right
up to my back.*

name: Me
text: I can hear you *right behind* me!

name: Me
text: I'm right *in front of you!*

I blurted that out as though to
obfuscate that my fear was
keeping me from standing up.

But then I suddenly heard her voice
whisper into my ear.

name: Mysterious Girl
text: *Are you going to run away... again?*

In that moment, it felt like time had
stopped.

name: Me
text: "Are you going to *run away...* again?"

name: Me
text: I'm sure that's what she said.

name: Me
text:
*"Run away"?*
Those are the last words *I ever want to hear.*

name: Me
text:
Could this girl somehow know about
*my past?*

name: Me
text:
I don't want to remember... 
...my *past of running away.*

name: Me
text: T-There's no way she'd know about that.

name: Me
text:
Is she angry at me for spending all
this time sitting around and not
helping her search?

name: Me
text:
T-There's no way I'd *run away!* 
I'll help you look now...

name: Me
text: I got up slowly and began to search for a *light switch.*

name: Me
text: If I just *feel around the wall,* I should be able to find *it.*

name: Me
text:
Through a mix of fear and tension,
my breath unconsciously became
labored...

Then, I felt *my fingers brush against
something* on the wall.
Its *shape* felt like a *light switch.*

name: Me
text:
Oh! I found it!
I'm turning on the *light!*
I hesitantly flipped the *switch.*

It turned on only a faint light in the
*middle of the room.*

I could tell that there was a *door* in
front of me.

name: Me
text:
F-For now, it's good that the *electricity*
is on.

name: Me
text:
It looks like there's a door right there,
so how about we leave?
There was *no reply* from the girl from earlier.

My eyes slowly *adjusted to the light,*
and I took in my surroundings.
*But no one was there.*

name: Me
text: W-What the hell is going on...?

name: Me
text:
Just a moment ago,
I know I was *talking to someone...*

name: Me
text:
I checked *the whole room,* and sure
enough, *there was no one there.*

name: Me
text: What was with that *voice* just now...?

name: Me
text: A-Anyway, I need to hurry up and get out of here...

I placed my hand over the *door
handle.*
[Clatter, clatter]

name: Me
text:
Damn it...! 
It's *locked!*

name: Me
text: Huh? What's this...?

Looking closely at the door, I noticed
something written on it.

In the *bright light* is the *key* to
opening this door.

name: Me
text: What does that mean?

name: Me
text: The *key* is in the *brightest place...*

name: Me
text:
Where exactly would the *brightest*
place here be...?

name: Me
text: I guess I'll look around...
Search Tutorial

name: Misaki
text:
Ah!
You're finally here!

name: Chie
text:
T-Then with that, the *last door's*
opened...

name: Me
text:
This is a *much bigger* room than
before. Moreover, there are a *number
of people* here.

name: Maki
text:
Were you also kidnapped here by
*somebody*?

name: Me
text: Y-Yes...

name: Kou
text:
Then it looks like we're all in the
*exact same situation...*

name: Me
text:
Umm...
What do you mean by that, exactly..?

name: Ritsu
text: Like any of us have any clue either.

name: Rintarou
text:
When everyone *woke up,* we all
found ourselves brought here♪

name: Me
text: I-I see...

name: Me
text:
Then, suddenly...
An *unsettling voice* echoed through
the room.

name: Creepy Voice
text:
Um... Ahem..
E-Everyone!

name: Creepy Voice
text: W-Welcome to *the Wolf Game!*

name: Creepy Voice
text:
Please take a seat in the *chair with
your name on it!*

But everyone remained where they
stood, and no one obeyed *the voice's*
request.

name: Creepy Voice
text:
H-Hey, everyone!
Please do *as you're told!*

name: Takeo
text:
Hurry up and let us out of here!
I'm *with the police!*

name: Creepy Voice
text: *Police officer* or not, we cannot let you out of here!

name: Kou
text:
Then what do we do to have you let us
leave?

name: Creepy Voice
text:
Ugh! If you don't do as you're told, you
will *be punished!*

name: Creepy Voice
text: You have *10 seconds!*

name: Ritsu
text: Yeah, *as if...*

name: Misaki
text:
Hey, um...
Shouldn't we listen to what it's asking,
just to be safe...?

name: Chie
text: I-Isn't this bad..?

name: Creepy Voice
text:
You have disregarded the rules, and so
we will commence your *punishment!*

name: Takuya
text: You think *we'd get scared* by that?!

name: なし
text:
In the next instant, a *sharp pain*
surged through my body.

name: Takeo
text: Gyaaow ow ow ow ow ow ow!

name: Ritsu
text:
Wh-What is this?!
It hurts!! It hurts!!

name: Misaki
text: Kyaaah!!

name: Satoru
text: *S-Stop* it already!!

name: Maki
text: P-Please, make it stop...

name: Me
text:
And in the next moment, the *sharp
pain* ceased.

name: Maki
text:
Hah, hah, hah...
What the hell was *that..?*

name: Creepy Voice
text: Do you feel more inclined to listen to orders now?

name: Misaki
text: Oh, look!

name: Miho
text: What are those things...?

name: Me
text:
Two figures were sitting in two chairs
in the center of the room.

name: Osamu
text: Is that... *a wolf* and... *a sheep?*

name: Merry
text:
Hello, everyone, please let us
introduce ourselves! We are the hosts
of this game, Merry, and-!

name: Wolfe
text: *Wolfe...*

name: Chie
text:
*Th-The dolls are talking...*
G-Gross...

name: Kou
text: Hey! What have you done to us?!

name: Merry
text:
W-We have had a *device* installed *into
your spinal nerves...!*

name: Takeo
text: A-Are you for real?!

name: Miho
text:
Ah... There's something *on the inside
of my neck...*

name: Wolfe
text:
If you try to pry it out, you *very well
could die,* so do be warned.

name: Wolfe
text:
Now how about we have you all sit in
the *chair with your name on it...*

This time, nobody would *disregard
their orders.*

We all did as we were told, and each
sat in our respective *chairs.*

name: Wolfe
text:
Should have just listened from the
start...

name: Wolfe
text: Then, with that...

name: Wolfe
text: We will now begin *the Wolf Game.*

We were all suddenly dealt a number
of *cards.*

name: Wolfe
text:
Now then.
Choose *one* of the *cards* in front of
you.

name: Wolfe
text:
These are *important cards* that will
*decide your fate.*

name: Me
text: *"Decide our fate"?*

name: Me
text:
What the hell is this thing talking
about?

Everyone seemed *confused,* but chose
their cards.
カードをめくるアニメ1

name: Me
text: (This is... *a sheep?)*

name: Me
text: There's a *sheep's face* in the center of the card I chose.

name: Wolfe
text:
Of the cards you have been dealt just
now, there are *two varieties.*

name: Wolfe
text:
There is the *sheep* card, and there is
the *wolf* card.

name: Wolfe
text:
It's fairly obvious, but the one who
has picked the *wolf card...*

name: Wolfe
text: *Must kill one sheep.*

name: Takuya
text: *Kill...?*

name: Kou
text:
Hey, hey...
*Cut the crap.*

name: Wolfe
text:
*A Wolf Trial* will be held *12 hours
after* the wolf has killed a sheep.

name: Wolfe
text:
There, the sheep will try to deduce
*who the wolf is.*

name: Wolfe
text:
They will then choose *one person* for
*execution.*

name: Wolfe
text:
If *the wolf is executed* without any
trouble, *the sheep will win.*

name: Wolfe
text: *The doors of escape* which will permit you to leave the building will open.

name: Wolfe
text:
Put simply, for the wolf to survive,
the *wolf must kill a sheep without
being found out.*

name: Wolfe
text:
The sheep must see through the wolf
and open the *doors of escape.*

name: Wolfe
text: You are all placing *your own lives* on the line in order to escape.

name: Miho
text: What happens if the *wolf doesn't kill a sheep...?*

name: Wolfe
text:
That will be taken as going against orders, and the wolf will be
*unconditionally executed.*

name: Maki
text: N-No way...

name: Wolfe
text: This *concludes* the *explanation.*

Saying this, *Merry and Wolfe* vanished
from sight.

name: Ritsu
text:
Shit!
Who's doing this, and *why?*

name: Osamu
text: That is unclear as of yet...

name: Rintarou
text:
So they say that if we *execute* the
wolf, the *doors of escape* will open,
huh♪

name: Rintarou
text: So, on that topic...

name: Rintarou
text: *Who's the wolf?*

name: Me
text:
Everyone was *silent* in response to his
*sudden question.*

name: Miho
text:
Well, in this situation, it's only
natural...

name: Kou
text:
So our *mutual deception* has already
begun...

name: Misaki
text:
W-We can't let this *gloomy
atmosphere* go on!

name: Misaki
text:
For the time being, how about we all
try to *put together our situation?*

name: Maki
text:
It's true that *so long as we don't
understand our situation,* we can't
understand anything else about it.

name: Miho
text:
Well, true.
Firstly, how about we *leave this room?*

name: Me
text: With that said, we all left *the room.*

name: Me
text:
But when we came out, we were met
with an *even stranger one.*

name: Ritsu
text: What is this place?

name: Satoru
text: Quite the creepy room...

name: Takeo
text:
Hey, everyone...
Would you mind *hearing me out* for a moment?

name: Takeo
text:
As stated before, I'm a *policeman.*
I'll be *protecting the peace,* so be at
ease.

name: Maki
text:
It is easy to be *calm* with a *policeman*
around...

name: Miho
text: Indeed...

name: Kou
text:
Well... 
There is also the possibility that
*you're the wolf.*

name: Takeo
text:
What?!
Like hell I am!

name: Ritsu
text: Well, can you *prove* that?

name: Takeo
text:
You guys...
Cut the...

name: Rintarou
text:
Now, now♪
*Let's not* get so riled up♪

name: Rintarou
text: I'm just thinking that fighting is just what the game's host *wants,* maybe♪

name: Takeo
text: Tch.

name: Kou
text: Hmph...

name: Misaki
text:
L-Let's all try to get along!
If we all *work together,* I'm sure we'll
be able to get out!

name: Ritsu
text:
It's the people who say things that are
the first to die~

name: Misaki
text:
...Things like what?
A-Anyway! Let's all get along!

name: Takuya
text:
Even if we all play buddy-buddy, the
wolf *still might kill someone,*
y'know?

name: Maki
text:
You don't *seriously think* they're going
to *kill someone!*

name: Satoru
text:
But *if the wolf doesn't kill a sheep,
they'll be executed,* right?

name: Kou
text:
Well, so long as what *those ridiculous
dolls* said is *true.*

name: Chie
text:
Then... *the wolf...*
Might *seriously be trying to kill
someone...* maybe...

name: Me
text:
A tense atmosphere, too tense to speak
through, began lingering in the air...

name: Satoru
text:
Well, we're getting nothing done like
this. Should we maybe try to *explore
the building?*

name: Rintarou
text:
Why not♪
Exploring *sounds fun♪*

name: Takeo
text:
In that case, it's *dangerous to act
alone.* I say we *form pairs* and *assign
separate areas to search.*

name: Misaki
text: Yeah, it's best that way...

name: Me
text:
I ended up pairing up with *Mori
Misaki,* the girl with an accent, to
search the 3rd floor.

name: Misaki
text: Let's work well together!

name: Me
text: Y-Yeah...

name: Kou
text:
Well then, let's waste no time and get
to *looking around...*

name: Miho
text:
Right. For safety's sake, let's all be
*careful.* *Who knows what might happen.*

name: Takeo
text: Alright, let's have everyone share *what we found out.*

name: Ritsu
text:
There were ze~ro windows or doors that looked like
 we could get out of on the first floor.

name: Kou
text: There's *food and water* in the kitchen refrigerator.

name: Maki
text:
*On the second floor,* we weren't able to find
 *any places we might be able to escape from,* but...

name: Maki
text:
*There were things that looked like they could be used as weapons, 
and also chemicals in a particular room...

name: Maki
text: It's as though *we're being told to use them...*

name: Me
text: *An unpleasant silence* swallowed us up...

name: Misaki
text: T-There weren't any place we could escape from on the third floor...

name: Misaki
text: But there was this one room that looked like a *classroom...*

name: Misaki
text: There's a blackboard in that room with, "Have you all come to understand *your true selves?*" written on it.

name: Kou
text:
"Your true selves"?
What's that supposed to mean...?

name: Rintarou
text: I wonder if it's some sorta *hint* to help us get outta here♪

name: Misaki
text: Ah, also, we found this laying around...

name: Miho
text: Are these... a doctor's *clinical records?*

name: Satoru
text:
Aren't those...
Those are *my patients' records!*

name: Maki
text: What? Really?

name: Satoru
text:
Why are my *patients' records* here?
Were they *stolen from my clinic?*

name: Kou
text: What exactly is going on...?

name: Misaki
text:
Um, also...
There was *one other strange thing.*

name: Misaki
text:
On top of a desk in the room, 
there was a *flower vase...*

name: Misaki
text: The desk was *scribbled all over...*

name: Misaki
text: And there was a *weird, thick card* on top of it...

name: Misaki
text:
"Dear Yuuya, 
ever since you've died, *Yuuya,* the whole class has been very *sad!*"

name: Misaki
text:
"Today, we're going to be holding a *commemmoration party* for your death.
From, the class."

name: Kou
text: What is this?

name: Misaki
text: Who is this *Yuuya* person...?

name: Satoru
text: There isn't anyone here named *Yuuya,* right?

name: Miho
text:
If this is some sort of prank,
then it's in very *poor taste.*

name: Rintarou
text: There are *nothing but mysteries,* huh...

name: Kou
text: Anyway... So we can conclude that *there are no places we can escape this building from* then...

name: Chie
text:
W-What do we do then?
The wolf might *kill a sheep,* won't they?

name: Takeo
text: Whatever the case may be, the most dangerous place here looks to be the *armory.*

name: Takeo
text: I'm going to *take watch over the armory* so nobody can take any weapons from there.

name: Ritsu
text:
Whoa~
Fiiishy!

name: Takeo
text:
N-No!
I'm really just thinking about *everyone's peace of mind!*

name: Takeo
text:
Then, hey, you.
How about you come with me?

name: Takuya
text:
What? Me?
I-I mean, fine, but...
It's kind of a pain in the ass...

name: Maki
text:
Thank you...
That'll maybe let us *relax a bit...*

name: Kou
text: Well, I'll be *acting on my own.*

name: Misaki
text:
N-No way!
It's so much easier to be calm if *everyone works together!*

name: Kou
text:
It's *dangerous* to stick around *people you can't trust.*
I'll *protect myself,* by myself.

name: Ritsu
text:
Like I was just saying, it's the people who say things like that~
You've sure got *balls.*

name: Satoru
text: I'm also going to see about continuing to *investigate* a little bit.

name: Misaki
text: It feels like everyone's gonna just *split up* at this rate.

name: Chie
text: M-Maybe I'll stay *together with you...*

name: Chie
text: I-It's okay, *I'm not the wolf,* so don't worry...

name: Misaki
text:
U-Um...
I-I'm a *little scared* with it being just the two of us, maybe...
In the end, we all ended up going *our separate ways.*

name: なし
text: Then, a few hours later...

name: Me
text:
I ended up spending time *in the large room on the third floor.*
There were *a number of people* also there with me.

name: Me
text: No one's been *killed* yet.

name: Me
text:
"If only *nothing bad would happen...*"
It was the very moment I had that thought.
Kyaaaaah!

name: Me
text: We suddenly heard someone scream from the botany room.

name: Ritsu
text: A-A scream?!

name: Rintarou
text: Wonder if *the first wolf's* finally made a move~
We rushed to the *room the scream came from.*

There, we saw *Misaki,* 
collapsed to the ground in the *doorway to the botany room.*

name: Misaki
text: O-Oh my...
And there we found *the lawyer, Miho,* who had been ruthlessly murdered.

name: Maki
text:
So...
*The wolf's killed someone,* then?

name: Takuya
text:
Well...
Sure looks the case...

name: Kou
text: In other words... the *Wolf Game* has truly begun.

name: Merry
text: U-Um! The *wolf* has gotten right to killing *a sheep!*

name: Chie
text:
Whoa!!
T-That scared me...

name: Merry
text:
W-Well then, in accordance with the
 rules, *after 12 hours have passed,
the Wolf Trial* shall commence!

name: Merry
text: I-In other words! We'll be giving you *12 hours,* so please use that time to search for clues to help deduce *who is the wolf!*

name: Merry
text: W-Well then, we'll be seeing you later!

name: なし
text: I could feel *my heart* begin to pound.
*The first murder* has now occurred...

name: Kou
text: Everyone's busy looking cute, but *there's a wolf* in our midst.

name: Rintarou
text: So the *Wolf Game* has finally begun...

We all then began to search for *clues* 
*that would help lead us to the wolf that killed Miho.*
CMを見る1

name: Merry
text:
A-Alright, everyone!
*12 hours have passed* since the wolf has made their kill!

name: Merry
text: W-We will now commence the *Wolf Trial!*

name: Misaki
text: So we're really doing it...

name: Kou
text: We don't have any choice but to listen to these guys for now.

name: Chie
text: I don't want to *be electrocuted* again...

name: Merry
text: D-During this Wolf Trial, we will have everyone attempt to reason out *who is the wolf!*

name: Merry
text: Then, you will all *choose one person* as the wolf *for execution!*

name: Osamu
text: Then this is to say that after this point *one person will die...*

name: Merry
text:
Precisely!
Then, if you have executed the wolf without issue, the doors leading to escape shall be opened!

name: Merry
text: We're *looking forward* to everyone's *masterful sleuthing!*

name: Merry
text: With that being said, let us commence the first *Wolf Trial!*

name: Merry
text: And with that, we will *execute Yonemori Satoru* as the *wolf!*

name: Satoru
text:
No...
P-Please, no...

name: Satoru
text:
I-I'm not the *wolf!*
I haven't *murdered* anyone!

name: Ritsu
text: You're the fuckin' *worst,* murdering someone even though you're supposed to be a doctor!

name: Merry
text: We have prepared a *fitting execution* for you, doctor!

name: Satoru
text:
H-Hey! Takeo!
You're a *police officer,* aren't you?

name: Satoru
text:
Please, stop these guys!
This is a clear-cut crime, isn't it?
Arrest them right now!

name: Satoru
text:
Hey! Don't *ignore* me!
You're a policeman, aren't you?

name: Merry
text: And with that, we will *commence the execution!*

name: Satoru
text: *Stooooooooooooop!!*
『処刑のアニメ』

name: Maki
text: T-That was...

name: Takuya
text: He seriously got freakin' *executed...*

name: Chie
text:
I-I feel a little...
B-Bad for him...

name: Wolfe
text: You don't have the time to be worrying about *someone else's life.*

name: Wolfe
text: Now, we will see if the person who was executed *was really the wolf.*

name: Rintarou
text: Oh, right♪

name: Wolfe
text: If you are correct, the *doors of escape* will open.

name: Merry
text:
Well then, everyone!
Are you all *ready?*

name: Merry
text: We will now *compare our answers!*
ドゥルドゥルドゥルドゥルのアニメ

name: Merry
text: Excellent work! *You were right!*

name: Merry
text: Precisely as everyone reasoned, *Yonemori Satoru* was the *wolf!*

name: Maki
text: T-Thank goodness...

name: Merry
text: So his target would not make a fuss, he put her to sleep by *making her drink sleeping pills.*

name: Merry
text: Then, when his target was fast asleep, he killed her by *injecting her with poison.*

name: Merry
text: Afterwards, by splattering *blood from the blood bags* over her corpse, he made her appear to have been *stabbed to death!*

name: Merry
text: Moreover, he had one of the two keeping watch over the armory drink a *laxative...*

name: Merry
text: In order to leave *the other one keeping watch all by himself in the armory.*

name: Merry
text: In doing this, he planned to *place the blame on the one left alone keeping watch.*

name: Takuya
text: That was close for me...

name: Ritsu
text: But he was *executed for real,* wasn't he...?

name: Misaki
text: It's almost as though we killed him ourselves...

name: Chie
text:
B-But... he *killed Miho himself...*
Isn't it his *just deserts?*

name: Osamu
text: Whatever the case may be, there is no *turning back* from this point...

name: なし
text: *Tension and anxiety* spread across everyone's faces.

name: Kou
text: Anyway, *our reasoning* was correct.

name: Osamu
text: Which means that the *doors of escape* will be opening, yes?

name: Wolfe
text:
That's right.
Should the *wolf's execution* succeed, the *doors of escape* will open.

name: Merry
text:
Well then, let us go!
*Open! The! Door!*
Merry shouts this, and the *doors of escape* open.
We nervously *exited through the doors* to the outside...

name: Osamu
text:
What... is this place?
It *doesn't* appear to be the *outside...*

name: Misaki
text: Isn't there supposed to be some kind of *door that leads outside* somewhere in this room?

name: Chie
text:
E-Everyone, look!
S-*Someone is asleep on the bed!*

name: Ritsu
text: T-There is!

name: Chie
text: S-Someone's *wrapped up in blankets...*

name: Ritsu
text:
Hey, ya old police guy!
Times like these are what we have a *policeman* around for, right?

name: Takeo
text:
What's with that way of talking to me?
Wasn't it you that was saying just before that *me being a policeman* had *nothing to do with anything?*

name: Ritsu
text:
Whaat?
I didn't say anything of the sort!

name: Takeo
text:
Tch... Well, whatever.
Well, I'll be unwrapping them.
Saying this, Takeo *unwrapped the blanket* with *incredible force.*

name: Takeo
text: Is this...

name: Takeo
text: ...a mannequin?

name: Maki
text: What is this thing? It's *creepy...*

name: Ritsu
text: And it's wearing clothes like some kinda *inpatient...*

name: Maki
text: Ah! Look at the nameplate...

name: Rintarou
text: It has "*Yuuya*" written on it♪

name: Kou
text: This name again?

name: Misaki
text: Isn't this the *same name* that we found on the *thick card* in the classroom earlier?

name: Osamu
text: That it keeps coming up means that this individual must be *deeply connected to the Wolf Game...*

name: Maki
text:
And look at the *doll sitting in that chair.*
Is it...

name: Maki
text: ...the *psychiatrist, Satoru?* The man that was just *executed?*

name: Takeo
text: It really does look just like him...

name: Rintarou
text: And it looks like he's holding something, too♪
"You *could have saved,* couldn't you? But instead you only *abandoned!*"

name: Takuya
text: What's with this?

name: Rintarou
text: Hm... How *cryptic*♪

name: Ritsu
text:
Oh!
And this document...

name: Ritsu
text: It has... "warning against *excessive dosage of medication*" written on it.

name: Misaki
text: It looks like it was from *5 years ago...*

name: Me
text: Let's read it.

name: Me
text: "Keep in mind as a doctor to properly examine your patients to determine the *suitable dose.*"

name: Me
text: "Doctors cannot maintain *drug addicts.* In particular, this is a warning to *Yonemori Satoru.*"

name: Ritsu
text: Huh? Satoru's name is on this!

name: Maki
text: So this was meant to be addressed to Satoru...?

name: Kou
text: Hmm, it mentions "*drug addicts*"...

name: Kou
text: It's likely that Satoru *overdosed his patients on medication.*

name: Rintarou
text: So Satoru didn't take his job as a doctor *seriously,* maybe?

name: Rintarou
text: Anyway, I wonder why a *doll* like this was prepared?

name: Kou
text: Perhaps the host of the Wolf Game is trying to *tell us something* by it...

name: Osamu
text: Then that must hold true for the *writing on this wall* as well...
"That you are all gathered here is not a matter of *coincidence...* but instead, *inevitability.*"

name: Kou
text: We were gathered here by *inevitability...*

name: Kou
text: In other words, we all share some kind of *commonality...*

name: Osamu
text: But this *our first time meeting* for everyone here, yes?

name: Chie
text: I've *locked myself up* in my room for many years now... The chance of me having been able to meet anyone here is probably *about zero...*

name: Maki
text:
Anyway, what's with this room?
They said that after the wolf was executed, the *doors of escape* would open, right?

name: Misaki
text:
T-That's right!
What's *with this,* then?

name: Merry
text: J-Just *one set of doors* opening will not lead you to the outside!

name: Misaki
text:
What?! That's *underhanded!*
You said we'd be able to leave if we executed the wolf!

name: Merry
text:
I-It's not underhanded!
We just said *the doors of escape* would open, but not that you would *be able to leave with only one set opening!*

name: Misaki
text: That's just an excuse!

name: Ritsu
text: Well, I didn't really get my hopes up that we'd be able to get out with just *one* of these *turn of events...*

name: Merry
text: U-Unlike appearances, you have quite the *mature point of view!*

name: Ritsu
text:
Say what?!
You're real annoying...

name: Merry
text: I-I'm sorry...

name: Wolfe
text: Well then, let us decide *the next wolf...*

name: Osamu
text: Is the *Wolf Game* still going to continue?

name: Merry
text:
But of course!
It will not end *until you escape!*

name: Kou
text: Putting it that way, you're not going to make the punchline that *no one can leave* even at the very end, are you?

name: Merry
text:
Absolutely not!
You *certainly* are capable of *leaving to the outside.*

name: Merry
text: So long as you understand *the truth of this game,* that is...

name: Maki
text:
T-*Truth?!*
What do you *mean?!*

name: Merry
text:
Ah?!
Um, well, um...!

name: Merry
text:
I'm sorry!
Goodbye for now!

name: Misaki
text: Ah, it left...

name: Wolfe
text: With that, let us quickly decide *the next wolf.*

name: Kou
text:
Hey, you!
What do you mean by *the truth of this game?*

name: Wolfe
text:
The meaning to that...
you already *know.*

name: Takuya
text:
We already know?
We're asking you *what you mean* by that!

name: Wolfe
text: Figure that out for yourselves.

name: Wolfe
text: *It's meaningless* if you don't.

name: Wolfe
text:
I will distribute the cards.
They'll decide *the next wolf.*
カードをめくるアニメ2

name: Me
text: (Thank goodness...)

name: Me
text: (I'm a *sheep...*)

name: Me
text: (I'm so glad I didn't end up the *wolf...*)

name: Me
text: (But anyway, who is this Yuuya person?)

name: Me
text: (There's *too little information* yet. I just don't know.)

name: Wolfe
text: Well then. Just as previously, those that are a *wolf,* kill a *sheep.*
Saying this, the doll known as *Wolfe* disappeared.

name: Maki
text: So that means someone is going *to be murdered* again?

name: Rintarou
text: Well, obviously, yeah♪

name: Takuya
text:
I ain't going along with this anymore.
Fuck this!

name: Kou
text: Well, if you want to die, feel free to *give up on this game.*

name: Takuya
text:
What now?
What kinda *cheeky* shit're you spouting?

name: Kou
text:
Hah...
Talking to *idiots* is exhausting.

name: Takuya
text: I swear, you *piss me off* any more...

name: Osamu
text: Nothing will come of *arguing* here.

name: Takuya
text: Tch.

name: Rintarou
text:
Hmm...
Geez, we sure make for *the worst atmosphere,* don't we♪

name: Ritsu
text: Well, how are you telling us to make a *good atmosphere* in a situation like this?

name: Rintarou
text:
Whaat♪
I just have *fun* in my own way like this♪

name: Chie
text:
Y-You...
E-*Even I of all people* think you're messed up in the head...

name: Rintarou
text:
Hey now~
That's so cruel♪

name: Me
text: We all fell completely into *rampant distrust* of each other.

name: Me
text: And in the end, we all ended up *going our separate ways.*

name: Kou
text: Enough already.

name: Kou
text: You've been talking *nonsense* for quite a while now.

name: Osamu
text:
Indeed...
To be frank, your actions have been rather *suspect.*

name: Satoru
text: It's almost as though you're *hiding something...*

name: Me
text: I-I don't mean anything like that!

name: Maki
text:
Alright then, everyone.
With things as they are, *who* do you think *is most suspicious?*
When asked this, *everyone* looked my way at once...

name: Chie
text: T-Then, shouldn't it be fine to call him the *wolf?*

name: Ritsu
text: No objections here!

name: Me
text: N-No way!

name: Merry
text: Well then, our target for *execution* appears to have been decided!

name: Merry
text: We will now commence the *execution!*

name: Merry
text: For our first go at an *execution,* we will be going with a rather orthodox approach!

name: Me
text:
Is this...
*A hanging...*?

name: Merry
text:
Yes!
The *traditional form of execution,* passed down from ancient times!

name: Merry
text: And with that, let us *commence the execution!*

name: Me
text:
N-No!
I-I don't want to diiiiiiiiie!!!

name: Ritsu
text: You're *hella fishy...*

name: Me
text: N-No, you're misunderstanding!

name: Ritsu
text: Kyaaa! Someone, save me!

name: Kou
text: What's the matter?!
Hearing Ritsu's *scream,* *people flooded* into the room.

name: Ritsu
text: This guy's the *wolf!*

name: Rintarou
text:
Oh?
Really~?

name: Ritsu
text: When I came here, I saw him *trying to snatch some sleeping pills!*

name: Maki
text:
Sleeping pills?!
What were you meaning to use those for...?

name: Me
text: I was just doing my own *investigation!*

name: Kou
text: You don't need *sleeping pills* to do your investigation, now, do you?

name: Chie
text:
And the way he's acting all *shaken up...*
L-Looks so *suspicious...*

name: Me
text: N-No way...

name: Me
text: Everyone's *icy stares* pierced into me.

name: Me
text: I-It's not me, really!

name: Me
text: But no matter how I tried to deny their accusations, *nobody was going to believe me under these circumstances.*

name: Me
text: I'm sure that I'll be *executed* in the upcoming Wolf Trial...

name: Me
text:
*Many hours* later,
*nothing* in particular *had occurred.*

name: Me
text: Maybe it was because I *hadn't gotten any proper rest* since I came here, but I was assailed by a *sudden sleepiness.*

name: Me
text: With vigilance of my surroundings, *I decided to sleep a bit...*。

name: Grade School Me
text:
Do I gotta change schools again?
But I hate *leaving my friends!*

name: Mother
text: You'll have to... It's because daddy has *work,* dear.

name: Grade School Me
text: N-Noo...

name: Teacher
text: Alright, we'll be introducing the new *transfer student.*

name: Grade School Me
text: H-Hello...

name: Teacher
text: Everyone, please get along well with him.

name: Classmates
text: Okaaay.

name: Teacher
text: Then for first hour, everyone please move to the *science classroom.*

name: Grade School Me
text: (Where is the *science classroom...?*)
I'll show you there!
Let's go together!

name: Grade School Me
text: T-Thank you...

name: Me
text: S-So that was a *dream...*

name: Me
text: A memory of the day I *transferred schools* back in grade school. It's a *dream I have often.*

name: Me
text: How long am I going to have to drag *that* with me...

name: Me
text: ...Anyway, what *time is it* right now?

name: Me
text: It's quiet, and I don't hear any sounds.

name: Me
text: Everyone else seems to be *fast asleep.*

name: Me
text: It was right then that I got the worst *urge to pee.*

name: Me
text: Careful to keep my footsteps quiet, I decided to go to the *bathroom.*

name: Me
text: *Surveying my surroundings,* I exited into the *hallway,* and...

name: Me
text:
...Hmm?
What's that...?

name: Me
text: In the dark *hallway ahead of me,* I could faintly see *a human silhouette...*

name: Me
text: Could it be...? Is that...

name: Me
text: *The wolf...?*

name: Me
text: It seems that they're looking in *the opposite direction,* so they haven't noticed me...

name: Me
text:
What do I do...?
Do I *run away* for now?

name: Me
text:
No, but...
If I can see who the wolf is, we can *execute* the wolf *for certain* in the upcoming Wolf Trial.

name: Me
text: I decided to *tail the wolf.*

name: Me
text: The wolf is slowly walking down the hallway, *their footsteps hardly making a sound.*

name: Me
text: It's a bit too dark to see well, but they seem to be holding *something like a weapon* in their left hand...
[Creak...]

name: Me
text: It was then that the *floorboards at my feet* creaked.

name: Me
text: The wolf noticed the sound, and stopped walking.

name: Me
text: C-Crap...

I made a sound...!
Where should I hide?

name: Me
text: I immediately hid behind one of the *hallway's supports.*

name: Me
text: I desperately *quieted my breathing,* and hid my presence.

name: Me
text:
Good...
I *don't* think I've been *discovered by the wolf.*

name: Me
text: Once more, the wolf began walking down the *dark hallway.*

name: Me
text:
That was a close one...
Maybe it's best to *turn back* for now?

name: Me
text: No... Like this, I haven't accomplished anything yet.

name: Me
text: *Once more,* I set out to *tail the wolf.*

name: Me
text: But when I did, all of a sudden *the wolf began to hurry their pace* and turned *the corner.*

name: Me
text: Without a second thought, I chased *right after them,* and turned the corner...

name: なし
text: When I turned the corner, *the wolf was standing right there, staring at me.*

name: Me
text: C-Crap...!

name: Me
text: I have to run!!

name: Me
text: I raced down the *dark hallway at full speed.*

name: Me
text: I-I have to find some kind of *room I can hide in...*

name: Me
text: And quickly...!

name: Me
text: Or else *I'm going to be killed!*

name: Me
text: The wolf noticed me! Which *room* do I hide in?

name: Me
text: I ran into the *kitchen.*

name: Me
text:
Hah, hah...
Isn't there *anywhere I can hide?*

name: Me
text: I need to find *somewhere to hide,* and fast!

name: Me
text: I managed to hide *in one of the shelves in the kitchen.*
[Door opens]

name: Me
text:
This is bad...
The wolf just entered *the kitchen...*
[Step... step...]

name: Me
text: This is really bad... They're coming this way...!
[Door opens]

name: Me
text: It looks like they're trying to search for me by opening *the shelves next to me...*
[Step... step...]

name: Me
text: Their *footsteps* are slowly coming my way...

name: Me
text: This is really, really bad! What do I do?!

name: Me
text:
If I don't do something...
*I'm going to be killed...*
[Step... step...]

name: Me
text: Then, the footsteps stopped *right in front of the shelf I was hiding inside.*

name: Me
text:
Crap...
They're going to find me...!

name: Me
text:
The wolf is approaching...
What do I do?

name: Me
text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!!!

name: Me
text: I let out a huge *shout,* and, fearing being seen by the others, the wolf *ran away.*

name: Me
text: That was so close...

name: Me
text: Somehow, I managed to *not get killed* there...

name: Me
text: *Without even a wink of sleep,* I continued a *vigilant* watch for the wolf.
Many hours later...

name: Me
text: Everyone gradually began to wake up, and with that came the usual morning racket.

name: Me
text: I decided to go to the *living room.*

name: Me
text: Good morning, everyone.

name: Maki
text: Oh, good morning...

name: Ritsu
text: Sup.

name: Rintarou
text: おはよう♪

name: Me
text: (Judging by how everyone *seems,* has *no murder occurred,* then?)

name: Me
text: It was the *instant* that I thought that.
Kyaaaaaa!!!
A sudden *scream* pierced the air.

name: Rintarou
text: Wonder who got *killed♪*

name: Maki
text: That scream came from the *floor above us,* right?

name: なし
text: We hurried to the *floro above us.*

name: Misaki
text: This is... horrendous...

name: Me
text: There, collapsed on the floor, was *Takuya's dead body.*

name: Rintarou
text: So it's *Takuya* this time...♪

name: Kou
text: And *the way that he was killed...*

name: Osamu
text: His *face* is hardly recognizable...

name: Takeo
text: So he was *beaten to death* with some kind of *blunt weapon,* then...?

name: Merry
text:
Oh my, oh my!
Has a *murder* occured?

name: Merry
text: それでは今から*12時間後*に、*狼裁判*を開廷します！

name: Merry
text:
それではみなさん！
*裁判*でお会いしましょう♪

name: Maki
text: また*あの裁判*をやらないといけないんだね…。

name: Me
text: (The *wolf that had been chasing me* yesterday is probably the one who did it...)

name: Me
text: (...meaning, maybe *I could have turned out like this* too...)

name: Me
text: The thought sent a *chill down my spine.*

name: Me
text: Thinking on it, *that mask the wolf was wearing...* I feel like *I've seen it* somewhere before.

name: Me
text: I'll start off by looking into matter of *the wolf that I saw yesterday.*

name: Wolfe
text: *Twelve hours* have passed since the wolf has *made their kill.*

name: Wolfe
text: We will now hold *the Wolf Trial.*

name: Merry
text: Have you all managed to find *evidence* relevant to the wolf?

name: Merry
text: The first time around, you utilized your *magnificent reasoning* to uncover the wolf!

name: Merry
text: I'm looking forward to everyone's *magnificent reasoning* this time around as well!

name: Wolfe
text: If you can execute the wolf, the next *doors of escape* will open.

name: Merry
text: The next time may very well allow you to *truly* make it *outside!*

name: Merry
text: And with that, let us *begin the second Wolf Trial!*

name: Merry
text:
W-Well then, everyone.
Have we decided *Kotori Takeo* as the target for execution?

name: Rintarou
text: Yup♪

name: Chie
text: Let's hurry up, a-and *execute him* already...

name: Takeo
text:
It's seriously not *me!*
Please believe me!

name: Kou
text: This is the *conclusion* that all of our reasoning brought us to...

name: Takeo
text:
N-No way...
But I really *didn't do anything...*

name: Takeo
text: Hey! Don't you think so too? You *saw the wolf* yesterday, didn't you?

name: Takeo
text: I'm not *the wolf,* right?

name: Wolfe
text: With that, we'll commence the *execution.*

name: Merry
text: This time, we've prepared an execution *most befitting an officer of the law,* so please, do enjoy it!

name: Takeo
text: Please, no... Not this...!

name: Merry
text: And with that, let us *commence the execution!*

name: Takeo
text: Please, NOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!
『処刑のアニメ』

name: Merry
text:
Wonderful!
The *execution is complete!*

name: Maki
text: T-That was awful...

name: Ritsu
text: But *he murdered someone,* so ain't that his *just deserts!*

name: Osamu
text: No matter his being a *police officer,* he did treasure *his own life* after all...

name: なし
text: In accordance with *our reasoning, Takeo, the policeman,* had been executed...

name: なし
text: But was *Takeo* really that *wolf...?*

name: なし
text: That *sense of unease* that I felt at the very end there... Was that just *a mere misunderstanding?*

name: Merry
text:
Well then, everyone!
It's time for our long-awaited *answer comparison!*

name: Merry
text: The true identity of *our just-executed Takeo* is...
ドゥルドゥルドゥルドゥルのアニメ

name: Merry
text:
*...a sheep!*
What a shame!

name: Rintarou
text: Were we wrong?

name: Ritsu
text: What? Seriously?!

name: Chie
text: Then, we just... *murdered* Takeo* even though he was *innocent...?*

name: Wolfe
text: That's right.

name: Kou
text: ...Tch.

name: Rintarou
text: We did something *awful* to Takeo, didn't we?

name: Maki
text:
But...!
Wasn't he *suspicious* during the Wolf Trial?

name: Osamu
text: Yes. I believe that everyone consented on that...

name: Me
text: (So that *sense of unease I had* was right after all...)

name: Me
text: (Why did I *pull out,* back in the trial...?)

name: Me
text: (If I had only *hadn't given up, and continued arguing, things might have turned out differently...)*

name: Merry
text: While this is a terrible shame, in order for this to count as *the wolf's victory, the doors of escape* shall not open this time!

name: Misaki
text: No way...

name: Merry
text:
These are *the rules* of this place!
*If a sheep is executed, the doors of escape* shall not open!

name: Me
text: (In order for the wolf to escape this place, they need to *kill a sheep without being found out.)*

name: Me
text: (So obviously they'd need to *use* all sorts of *tricks* to accomplish that...)

name: Me
text: (It's too late thinking about it now, but that *burned shirt* must have also been *a trap* for the wolf to *lead us on* with...)

name: Misaki
text: We've done such a タケオさんに、なんて*申し訳ないこと*を…。

name: Kou
text: With the rules as they are, we *can't do anything about* things like this also happening too.

name: Rintarou
text: I'm sorry, *Takeo...*

name: Chie
text: I-I'm... *regretting this from the bottom of my heart...*

name: Kou
text: Nothing's going to come out of sulking.

name: Kou
text: Let's just get on with deciding *the next wolf* and opening *the doors of escape.*

name: Merry
text: What a *forward-facing spirit!* Most excellent!

name: Merry
text: And with that, let us quickly decide upon *the next wolf!* Everyone, please pull *a card!*
カードをめくるアニメ3

name: Me
text: My reasoning *isn't being accepted by anyone,* and *instead I'm being suspected...*

name: Ritsu
text: But hey, the crap you've been spouting's been some real *nonsense,* ya know!

name: Me
text: S-Sorry... I didn't mean to...

name: Osamu
text: The matter of you being chased by the wolf yesterday is also *a little suspicious,* is it not?

name: Maki
text:
That's right...
With that kind of testimony, it's as though you want to immediately clear that *you're not the wolf.*

name: Kou
text:
I see.
Then that *you saw the wolf is also a lie?*

name: Me
text:
N-No!
I'm not lying! Please, believe me!

name: Rintarou
text: Even if you ask us to, you've been making so many *strange statements,* it's just hard to♪

name: Me
text: N-No way...

name: Rintarou
text:
Hey~
How about we just call *him the wolf?*

name: Chie
text:
I-I think that's fine...
Let's kill him *quickly...*

name: Me
text:
P-Please, just wait a moment!
I'm *not lying!*

name: Me
text: Please, believe me!
But *no one would listen* to me.

name: Wolfe
text: At any rate, it seems we've decided our *target for execution...*

name: Wolfe
text: Then this round's *wolf is you...*

name: Wolfe
text: We will now *commence your execution.*

name: Me
text: It's really, honestly not me!

name: Me
text: I'm not the wolf!

name: Wolfe
text: The *execution* this time around will be this...

name: Wolfe
text: *A burning at the stake.*

name: Me
text:
No...
Stop this!
I was forcefully tied to *a wooden post.*

name: Me
text: Please stop!

name: Wolfe
text: We'll be *igniting* it...

name: Me
text: Please, stop!!

name: Me
text: STOOOOOOOOP!!!!!
I immediately hid *behind a shelf in the hallway.*
[Step... step... step...]
The wolf is slowly approaching...

name: Me
text: (Crap... Have I been spotted...?)
[Step... step... step...]
And after a little while, *the wolf's footsteps* stopped.

name: Me
text: Alright... Did they let me slip by?

name: Wolf
text: *I can see your legs...*

name: Me
text: Huh?
[Smash!]
In the next instant, *a sharp sound* and a *sharp pain* shot through my head.
There was *blood* pooled around me.
And, collapsed on the floor, I lost *consciousness...*
I hurriedly fled into the *bathroom.*

name: Me
text: (Where? Where can I *hide?)*
I hid on the *other side* of one of the *curtains* in the room.
[Door opens...]
[Step... step...]
I could hear *the wolf* slowly going through *the toilets.*
[Door opens... Door opens...]
It looks like the wolf is checking *the toilet stalls...*

name: Me
text: If I don't think up something quickly, they're going to come here...

name: Me
text: (Don't I have anything? Anything I *can fight back with?)*
[Step... step...]
*The wolf's footsteps* are approaching where I am.

name: Me
text: (Crap... crap...!)
[Step... step...]
The wolf's footsteps stopped right before *my hiding spot.*
I silenced my breath.

name: Me
text: (Huh? *They're not making any more noise...)*

name: Me
text: (*Where* did the wolf *go?)*

name: Me
text: (Did they give up and go elsewhere?)
It was right *when I had that thought...*
I heard *a voice from above my head.*

name: Wolf
text: "Above you."
When I reflexively *looked up,* there stood *the wolf looking down at me and raising something like a blunt weapon over their head.
[Smash!]
In the next instant, *a sharp pain* echoed through *my skull.*
The floor of the bathroom was doused in *red.*
I fell to the ground, and immediately *lost consciousness.*

name: Me
text: I-I need to hide, and quickly...! Isn't there anywhere I can?
[Door opens]
At that instant, the wolf *opened the door to the kitchen* and entered.
*I had hesitated too long* in trying to find a hiding place, and ended up being found by the wolf...

name: Me
text: H-Hey, please, hold on...!

name: Me
text: Please! *Don't kill me...*

name: Me
text: I won't tell anyone about this, I swear! I-If you'd like, *I can even cooperate with you!*

name: Me
text: I can even be a *witness for your alibi!*

name: Me
text: S-... So... Please, don't kill me...
The wolf began *slowly walking towards me.*
They were gripping some sort of *large blunt weapon* in their hand.

name: Me
text: Hey! It's really not a *bad deal* for you, right?
The wolf said nothing.

name: Me
text: (Shit... At this rate, *I'm going to be killed...)*
It was then that I noticed *a kitchen knife on top of a nearby desk.*

name: Me
text: (I've got no better options; *I'll have to defend myself with this kitchen knife...)*

name: Me
text:
Right...?
I'm begging you...

name: Me
text: I'll be *your ally!*
As I said this, I approached *the kitchen knife.*
And in the next moment!
俺は*包丁を手にして、狼に襲いかかろう*とした。
しかし、そこに*狼*はいなかった。

name: Me
text: あ、あれ？

name: Wolf
text: 「*バレバレ*だよ」
狼は俺が*目線を外した一瞬*の内に*俺の背後*に回り込んでいたのだ。

name: Me
text: く、クソ…。
ドガッ
次の瞬間、俺は頭を後ろから*思い切り殴られた*。
*頭を殴られた衝撃*で、俺は床に倒れ込んだ。
コツ…コツ…
床に倒れた俺に狼が近づいて来る。
そして、狼はもう一度倒れている俺に向かって、*大きな鈍器*を思い切り振り下ろした。
グシャッ
俺はその瞬間、意識がなくなった。

name: Me
text: (ぜ、絶対にバレている…。)

name: Me
text: (ここで大人しくしてても*殺される*だけだ…。)

name: Me
text: (一気に飛び出して、*全速力で逃げよう*…。)

name: Me
text: (狼も暗闇で俺を捕まえるのも難しいはずだ…。)

name: Me
text: (もう*迷ってる暇*はない…。)

name: Me
text: (今だ！)
俺は勢いよく棚の扉を開け、外に*飛び出した*…。
しかし、目の前には*鈍器のようなものを持った狼*が立っていた。

name: Me
text: (まずい…。*逃げ場*がない…。)

name: Me
text:
に、逃げようとしてごめんね…。
*降参*するよ…。
俺は何とか*狼を油断させて反撃*できないか、とっさにそんなことを口走った。

name: Me
text:
あ、あの…本当に…。
すまない…。
俺が喋り出した*瞬間*だった。
*ドガッ*
狼は持っていた*鈍器で俺を激しく殴りつけた*。
俺は*床に倒れ込んだ*。
頭から*大量の血*が流れ出していた。

name: Me
text: い、いやだ…。

name: Me
text: *死にたくない*…。

name: Me
text: お願いだ…。

name: Me
text: *殺さないで*くれ…。
狼は無言でこちらに近づいて来る。

name: Me
text: もう…やめてくれ…。
狼は何も言わずに、手に持った*鈍器を何回も俺の頭に振り下ろしてきた*。
次の瞬間、俺は意識を失ってしまった…。

name: Me
text: こ、これは…。

name: Me
text: とうとう、*狼*をひいてしまった…。

name: Me
text: 俺が*生き残る*には、この中の羊を*殺す*しかない…。

name: Me
text: 突然、*心臓の音*が激しくなる。

name: Me
text: こみ上げる*緊張と恐怖*で頭の中が真っ白になりそうだ…。

name: Me
text: 俺に…*人を殺す*なんて出来るのか？

name: Me
text: その時、混乱する頭の中でなぜか*昔の記憶*が思い出される…。

name: Me
text: なんで…こんな時に…。

へー。じゃあ、もう*何回*も転校してるんだ！
すごいね！

name: 昔のYou
text:
べ、別に…。
友達毎回作り直すのとか大変だし…。
じゃあ、今回は僕が*転校先の友達1番目*だね！

name: 昔のYou
text:
う、うん…。
あ、ありがとう…。
僕のほうこそだよ…。
君が来るまで、*ひとりぼっち*だったから…。

name: 昔のYou
text: そうなの？

う、うん…。
実は僕、*いじめ*られてて…。

あ！
でも気を使わないでいいからね！
もし、僕といるせいで君も*いじめられそう*になったら*見捨てて*いいからね。

name: 昔のYou
text: そ、そんなことするわけないよ…。
本当！？

name: 昔のYou
text:
うん。
僕は、どんなことがあっても*君と友達*だよ。

ありがとう！
*君みたいな友達*ができたの僕初めてだよ！

name: Me
text: な、なぜこんな大変な時に、*昔のこと*なんて*思い出して*るんだよ…。

name: Me
text: と、とにかく今は*生きることだけに集中*しよう。

name: Me
text: *狼*を引いたからには*迷っていられない*…。

name: Me
text: 俺は、*覚悟*を決めた。

name: Me
text: まずは、*凶器*を手に入れなければいけない…。

name: Me
text: 凶器を手に入れた後は、*誰か選んで羊を殺す*んだ…。

name: Me
text: お、俺にそんなことが*できる*のか？

name: Me
text: でも…。

name: Me
text: やるしかない…。

name: Me
text: 俺は、*極限状態*の中でYouにそう言い聞かせた。

name: Me
text: もう…やるしかないぞ…。
俺は、もう一度*鏡の破片*を握り直した。

name: Me
text: Youが*生き残るため*だ…。
俺は気付かれないように*オサムさんの背後*に近づいた…。
部屋の奥のイスに座っている*オサムさん*が見える。

name: Me
text:
オサムさんは*寝ている*のだろうか？
殺るなら、今が*チャンス*だ…。
全身から*冷たい汗*が吹き出す…。

name: Me
text: *迷って*はいけない…。

name: Me
text: ここは*一気*にやるんだ…。
椅子に座っているオサムさんはまだ*俺には気づいていない*。

name: Me
text: 今だ！
俺は手に握った*鏡の破片*を振り下そうとした。
その時だった…。

name: Me
text: ど、どういうことだ…？
なんと、そこに座っていたオサムさんは…。
すでに*死んで*いた…。

name: Me
text: どうして…。
オサムさんは*血を流し*、椅子にもたれているように死んでいた。

name: Me
text:
*狼は俺*なのに…。
*誰が殺した*んだ？

name: Me
text: まさか…*俺以外にも狼*がいるのか？

name: Me
text: 一体誰が…。
その時だった…。

name: Maki
text: 見つかっちゃったね…。
突如*背後*から声がした。

name: Me
text: う、うわ！

name: Me
text: そこには*血のついたナイフ*をもった*マキさん*が立っていた。

name: Maki
text: あなた今、*オサムさんを殺そう*としていたよね？

name: Me
text: え、えっと…。今のは…。

name: Maki
text:
今回の*狼は私*のはず。
なのになぜあなたも彼を*殺そう*としたの…？

name: Me
text:
え、えっと…。
それは…。

name: Maki
text: 申し訳ないけど、見られたからには…。

name: Maki
text: *君も殺す*しかないね…。
そう言うと彼女はこちらに近づいてくる。

name: Me
text: こ…*殺される*…。

name: Me
text: ち、ちょっと待って！

name: Me
text: お、俺も*狼*なんだ！

name: Maki
text: は？そんなこと*信じるわけない*でしょう？

name: Me
text: ほ、本当なんだ…。

name: Me
text: 俺も*狼のカード*を引いて…。

name: Me
text: 俺も、オサムさんを狙って、*忍び込んだ*ところだったんだ…。

name: Maki
text: ほ、本当に、狼なの…？

name: Me
text:
そうだよ。
何より*オサムさんを殺そうとした*行動こそが証拠だよ！

name: Maki
text:
なるほど…。
確かにそうだね…。

name: Maki
text: 私たちは勝手に*狼が1人*だけだと思い込んでたけど、*ルール*ではそんなこと明言されていなかったものね…。

name: Me
text: だから、別に*狼が2人いても*何も不思議ではないよ。

name: Maki
text:
じゃあ、私たちは*2人とも狼*で、
さらにどちらも*オサムさんを狙ってしまった*。

name: Me
text: そして、偶然にもその*殺害直後*に出くわしてしまったんだ…。

name: Maki
text:
なるほど…。
それなら筋が通るわね…。

name: Maki
text: これからどうするの？

name: Me
text: それは…。

name: Maki
text: もちろん私に*協力*してくれるよね？

name: Me
text: え？

name: Maki
text: もし協力してくれなければ…。

name: Maki
text: この場でやっぱりあなたを*殺す*。

name: Maki
text: でも、もし*協力*してくれるなら、あなたが狼だと言うことは*秘密*にするわ。

name: Maki
text: それに、この状況なら、あなたと私の*状況の違いなんてほとんどない*わ。

name: Maki
text: むしろ私の方が*有利*なぐらいよ。

name: Me
text: ど、どうして？

name: Maki
text: あなたのその凶器、*シャワールームの鏡*でしょう？

name: Me
text: そ、そうだけど…。

name: Maki
text: 私の*凶器のナイフ*はみんなが気づいていないときに*物置*で見つけてずっと*隠し持っていた*ものなの。

name: Maki
text: *凶器と言う面*ではっきりしているあなたは、そこを責められると*不利*でしょう？

name: Me
text: た、確かに…。

name: Maki
text: それに、あなたのその*左手の傷*も…。

name: Maki
text: *鏡の破片を入手した時*にできた傷なんでしょうけど、それも不利な*証拠*よね？

name: Me
text: ど、どうしてそれを…。

name: Me
text: (これは*彼女に協力した方が良さそう*だな。)

name: Maki
text:
いい？
じゃあ、私たちは今から*協力関係*ね。

name: Maki
text: 2人で協力して、この殺人を*違う人のせい*にするのよ。

name: Me
text:
う、うん。
わかったよ。

name: Maki
text: じゃあ、とりあえず*死体*をどこかに隠しましょうか？

name: Me
text:
えーっと、ここの*棚の中*はどうかな？
*前に本を積み上げれば*簡単に見つかることはなさそうだね。

name: Maki
text:
いいね。
じゃあ、早いとこ隠しちゃおう。
俺たちは素早く*死体*を隠し、さらにその*棚の前に本*を積み上げた。

name: Me
text: これで、ひとまず*時間を稼げる*ね。

name: Maki
text:
そうだね。
じゃあ、今から*偽装工作*を開始しましょう…。

name: Maki
text: まずは*何から*始めましょうか…。
CMを見る2

name: Me
text:
よし…。
ひとまずは*深夜3時*を待とう…。

name: Me
text: おっと…その前にもう*一つ大事なモノ*の存在を忘れていた…。

name: Me
text:
*用意した凶器*が見つかったら大変だ…。
見つからないように隠しておこう…。
俺は*植物室*の*プランターの下*に、*鏡の破片*を隠した。

name: Me
text: よし。これで準備OKだ…。

name: Me
text: あとは*深夜3時*に*誰かと一緒にいる状況*を作り、*アリバイを成立*させればいい。

name: Me
text: 俺は、*深夜3時*まで*リンタロウがいる部屋*で過ごすことにした。

name: Me
text: これで*炎が上がった瞬間*に*リンタロウ*と一緒にいれば、*アリバイ成立*となる。

name: Me
text: 時計の針はあと*10分*ほどで、*深夜3時*を指そうとしている。

name: Me
text: 計画がうまく行けば、*悲鳴が聞こえ*、*死体から炎が上がる*はずだ。

name: Me
text: 俺はなるべく自然に見えるように、ソファで*寝ている振り*をしていた。

name: Rintarou
text: ねぇ？起きてる？

name: Me
text:
(い、いきなりどうしたんだ？
*無視するのも怪しい*よな…。)

name: Me
text:
ごめん。*寝てた*みたいで…。
何か用かな？

name: Me
text: (我ながら、かなり*自然に寝起きな感じ*ができた気がする…。)

name: Rintarou
text: 君、さっきからどうして*寝ている振り*してるの？

name: Me
text:
(こいつは…。
本当に変なところが*鋭いやつ*だ…。)

name: Me
text: べ、別に*寝てるふり*なんてしてないけど…。

name: Rintarou
text: え〜うそぉ♪

name: Me
text:
い、いや。
本当に*普通に寝てた*よ…俺…。

name: Rintarou
text:
ふーん。
そうなんだ。僕の*勘違い*か。

name: Rintarou
text:
ごめんね♪
*変なこと*言っちゃって♪

name: Me
text: い、いいよ。別に…。

name: Rintarou
text:
僕はてっきり君が*何か企んでるのかな*？
なんて思っちゃった♪

name: Me
text: そ、そんなことないよ…。

name: Me
text: ちょうどその時だった…。
「ウワーッ!!」

*悲鳴*が建物の中に響いた…。
時刻は*深夜3時*だ…。

name: Me
text: い、今*悲鳴*が聞こえたよね？

name: Rintarou
text:
うん♪
そうみたいだね♪

name: Me
text: *図書室*らへんから聞こえたようだけど…。

name: Rintarou
text:
へー♪
よく*図書室*らへんってわかるね♪

name: Me
text:
え、えっと…。
別に*なんとなくの勘*だけどね。

name: Me
text:
(こいつ…。
もしかして、俺を*疑ってる*のか？)

name: Rintarou
text:
ふーん。
*勘*ね…♪

name: Rintarou
text: じゃあ、その*勘*にしたがって、*図書室*に行ってみよう♪

name: Me
text: う、うん…。

name: Me
text:
(こいつ、本当に俺のこと…。
それよりまずは、*図書室*に駆けつけよう。)
俺とリンタロウはそのまま*図書室*へと向かった…。

name: なし
text: 既にそこには*数人*が集まっていた。

name: リンタロウ
text:
すごーい！
本当に*勘が当たった*ね！

name: Me
text: た、たまたまだよ…。
図書室につくと、あたりに*煙*が充満していた。
全て*計画通り*に進み、今まさしく、*炎に包まれているオサムさん*がいた。

name: Misaki
text:
や、やばいで！
早く*火を消さないと*！

name: Maki
text:
だ、誰か急いで*消火器*を！
早くしないと*手遅れ*になっちゃう！
マキさんがみんなに*消火*を呼びかける。

name: Me
text: わ、わかった！
俺は、すぐに*消火器*を見つけ出し、*消火活動*を行った。

name: Chie
text: ひ、火は無事に消えましたけど…。

name: Ritsu
text: これはとてもじゃないけど、助からねーな…。
そこには、炎で燃えた*オサムさんの死体*が横たわっていた…。

name: Chie
text:
オサムさん…。
さぞかし*熱かった*だろうに…。

name: Maki
text: もう少し火を消すのが早ければ*助けられた*かもしれないね…。

name: Misaki
text:
そやな…。
*悲鳴が聞こえて*、駆けつけた時はもうすでに*火*が上がってたもんな…。

name: Me
text:
(よし…。
狙い通り、*たった今焼死*したと思っているぞ…。)

name: Rintarou
text:
オサムさん。
*たった今*、燃やされて死んじゃったのかー♪

name: Rintarou
text: かわいそうだなー♪

name: Me
text: (まさか…。バレてないよな？)

name: Me
text:
(動揺してはいけない…。
あくまで*自然*にふるまわなければ…。)

name: Me
text: そのあと、全員が狼を探すために*探索を開始*した。

name: Me
text: 俺の方は、急いで*ボイスレコーダーの回収*をしなければならない。

name: Me
text: 俺はこれまでと同じように、*淡々と*探索を開始したのだった。
CMを見る3

name: Wolfe
text: それでは今から*狼裁判*を開廷する。

name: Kou
text: だいぶ*人数が減った*な…。

name: Maki
text: もう*3回目の狼裁判*だからね…。

name: Misaki
text: さすがにもうこれ以上*人が死ぬ*のは*限界*やわ…。

name: Ritsu
text: もういい加減、*出してくれ*って感じー。

name: Chie
text: 私も早く自宅に帰って、また*引きこもり*たい…。

name: Rintarou
text: でも人数も減って、狼にとっては*不利な状況*になってきたね♪

name: Kou
text:
確かにそうだな…。
人数が少なくなると、*犯人も特定しやすく*なる。

name: Maki
text: そう考えると、今回の裁判は*絶対狼を見つけ出したい*わね…。

name: Me
text: そ、そうだね…。

name: Me
text: (今回の狼は*俺とマキさん*だ…。)

name: Me
text: (実際に殺害したのはマキさんだが、俺たちは2人で*アリバイ工作*を行った。)

name: Me
text: (この*アリバイさえ*崩れなければ俺たちが怪しまれることはない。)

name: Me
text: (とにかく、今回の狼裁判は今までとはわけが違う。)

name: Me
text: (バレないようにうまく*立ち回らなければいけない*…。)

name: Wolfe
text: それでは、*狼裁判を開廷*する。

name: Merry
text:
それではみなさん。
今回の*狼*は*マキさん*でいいですか？

name: Maki
text:
い、いやだ…！
あいつも*狼*だよ！

name: Me
text:
もういい加減、*悪あがき*はやめなよ…。
見苦しいよ…。

name: Maki
text: お、お前…。

name: Me
text: (途中で*俺に罪をかぶせよう*としてきたくせに…。)

name: Me
text: (自業自得だ…。)

name: Kou
text:
今回は間違いない。
確実にそいつが*狼*だ。

name: Rintarou
text: Youで*墓穴を掘っちゃった*ね♪

name: Ritsu
text:
マキさん。
*いい人*だったのに残念だなぁ〜。

name: Chie
text:
私も…。
マキさんなら*友達*になれそうだと思ってたのに…。

name: Misaki
text: マキさん…。

name: Merry
text: それでは処刑を開始します！

name: Maki
text:
いや…。
死にたく…ない…。
『処刑のアニメ』

name: Wolfe
text: 無事、*高山マキ*の処刑が完了した…。

name: Me
text: (この瞬間、*正直とても安心*していた…。)

name: Me
text:
(*狼を引いた時*はどうなることかと思ったが…。
よかった…。)

name: Wolfe
text: それではお前らの*推理が正しい*のか。

name: Wolfe
text: *答え合わせ*をしようか…。

name: Kou
text:
ふん。
今回は*そいつが狼*に決まっている。

name: Rintarou
text:
ん〜♪
ドキドキだね♪

name: Wolfe
text: お前らが*処刑したあいつ*は…。
ドゥルドゥルドゥルドゥルのアニメ

name: Wolfe
text: *正解*だ。

name: Wolfe
text: あいつが*狼*だ。

name: Chie
text: よ、よかった…。

name: Kou
text: ふん。当然だ…。

name: Wolfe
text: お前たちの推理通り、狼は*発火する前*に*永井オサム*を殺害。

name: Wolfe
text: そして、灯油のトリックを使い*時間差で発火*するように細工。

name: Wolfe
text: さらに、*ボイスレコーダー*を使い*悲鳴を再生*することで、まるで今まで*生きていたかのよう*に演出した。

name: Wolfe
text: そして、発火時間に誰かと一緒に過ごすことで*アリバイ*を作り、何食わぬ顔で現場に現れた。

name: Wolfe
text: それが今回の*殺害の全容*だ。

name: Rintarou
text: こんなに手の混んだことを*1人*でやっちゃうなんてすごいね♪

name: Me
text: (こ、こいつ本当に*いちいち鋭い奴*だな…。)

name: Kou
text: *正解*と言うことは*脱出の扉*が開くと言うことだな？

name: Ritsu
text:
おー！
*次こそ*出られんじゃね？

name: Wolfe
text:
それは*約束どおり*…。
今から*脱出の扉*を開く。
ガチャ

name: Misaki
text:
う、うそや…。
*また部屋*…。

name: Ritsu
text:
マジかよー。
もうさすがに*しつこい*って…。

name: Chie
text: はぁ…。

name: Kou
text: しかし、この部屋は今までの部屋とは*雰囲気*が違う…。

name: Chie
text:
た、確かに…。
*普通*すぎるのが*逆に不気味*…。

name: Misaki
text:
これは…。
*子供*の人形？

name: Rintarou
text: *女の子*と*男の子*…かな？

name: Chie
text: 1人がうずくまって、もう1人は*何か書いてる*？

name: Misaki
text:
ねぇ…。
この子が書いてる紙、見て…。

name: Misaki
text: 「*Yuuyaをコロしたい*」って書いてる…。

name: Kou
text: また*Yuuya*か…。

name: Chie
text: し、しかも*コロしたい*って…。

name: Ritsu
text: 教室の*色紙*といい、この絵といい、*Yuuya*ってやつ*よっぽど嫌われてる*んだな…。

name: Misaki
text:
この部屋も*意味不明*やし…。
*この子たち*は一体何なんやろ…。

name: Chie
text:
それに…。
あれ…。

name: Ritsu
text: これは！*マキさん*の人形…。

name: Misaki
text: そ、そして例によってまた*何か書いてある*ね…。

name: Misaki
text: 『*人の不幸*を取り上げて生きていくお前らに*価値はない*』

name: Misaki
text: 「人の不幸を取り上げて」って…マキさんが*週刊誌の記者*だから、それを表しているのかな？

name: Ritsu
text: まあ週刊誌って*ゲスい内容*で*人の不幸*を面白おかしく記事にしたりするよな。

name: Rintarou
text: 週刊誌にイヤなこと書かれた人がそれに怒ってるのかなぁ〜？

name: Ritsu
text:
でも、「*お前ら*に価値はない」って書いてるけど、ワタシたち、記者じゃねーし。
一体どうゆうことだよ？

name: Misaki
text: でもここ見て、もう一つ文章が書いてあるよ…。

name: Misaki
text: 「お前たちの*行い*が、*人生を狂わせた*。」

name: Ritsu
text: 「お前たちの…」って、やっぱり*私たち*のことか？

name: Rintarou
text: おそらくそうだろうね♪

name: Kou
text: *俺たちの行動*が人生を狂わせた？

name: Kou
text: じゃあ、この狼ゲームはその*狂わされたやつ*からの*俺たちへの復讐*と言うことか？

name: Chie
text:
で、でも私たちは*初対面*ですし…。
だ、誰か*共通の人に恨まれる*なんてことありえないのでは…。

name: Kou
text: それか、*俺たちが認識していない*だけで、誰か*共通の人間に恨まれる*ことをしてしまった…。

name: Misaki
text:
確かにその*可能性は０じゃない*かも…。
*知らない内*に誰か傷つけてるってことあるし…。

name: Ritsu
text: それが*Yuuya*という名前と関係してるとか？

name: Kou
text:
おそらく…。
この中に*Yuuya*と聞いて、何か*心あたり*があるやつはいるか？

name: Ritsu
text:
うーん…。
よくある*名前*だしな…。

name: Rintarou
text: 僕も、これと言う人はいないかな♪

name: Chie
text: わ、私もいないです…。

name: Me
text: 俺も知らないな…。

name: Misaki
text: ウチも別にいないな…。

name: Rintarou
text:
んー、やっぱり*Yuuya*なんて知らないんだね…。
もう*少し情報*がほしいな♪

name: Merry
text: お取り込みのところすいませんが、*次の狼*を決めますよ！

name: Misaki
text: そ、そうやったな…。

name: Misaki
text:
なぁ、Merryちゃん…。
次の狼を決める前に*ちょっと質問*なんやけど…。

name: Misaki
text:
*Yuuya*って一体誰なん？
本当にいるの？

name: Merry
text: *Yuuya*は*実在*します…。

name: Merry
text: そしてあなたたちは*Yuuya*を知っていますよ。

name: Ritsu
text: だからそんなやつ*知らない*んだけどー。

name: Me
text: (俺も*Yuuya*なんて知らないぞ…。一体誰なんだ？)

name: Chie
text:
で、でも私…。
*男の子の知り合い*なんていないし…。

name: Wolfe
text: おい。いつまで話をしている。

name: Wolfe
text: さっさと*次の狼*を決めるぞ。

name: Wolfe
text: それでは、*目の前のカード*を引け。
カードをめくるアニメ4
俺の推理はみんなに納得してもらえず、*逆に怪しまれてしまった*…。

name: Maki
text: さっきから君の言っていること意味不明だよ？

name: Me
text:
そ、そんなことないよ！
(ク、クソ！マキさん。*全ての罪*を俺に*なすりつける*気か…。)

name: Kou
text:
いや。
お前の発言はさっきからどう見てもおかしいぞ。

name: Kou
text: 矛盾だらけで、まるで何か*嘘*をついているようだ。

name: Me
text: う、*嘘*なんてついてないよ！

name: Ritsu
text:
うっわ！あんた*嘘*下手すぎ！
態度に出過ぎだって！

name: Me
text:
違う！
本当に俺は*狼*じゃないんだ！

name: Me
text: クソ…。一体どうすれば…。

name: Chie
text: ひ、*人を燃やす*なんて本当に残酷…。

name: Me
text: だ、だから俺じゃないのに！

name: Maki
text: もういい加減言い訳やめなよ…。

name: Maki
text: 惨めすぎて見てられないよ…。

name: Me
text: こ、こいつ…。

name: Merry
text: それではみなさん処刑対象が決まったようですね？

name: Merry
text: 処刑するのは彼でいいですか？

name: Rintarou
text:
はーい♪
だって怪しいもん♪

name: Chie
text: それしか考えられないですね…。

name: Me
text: クソ！

name: Me
text: 本当に俺じゃないのに！

name: Merry
text: それでは処刑対象が確定したので、今から処刑を開始します！

name: Merry
text: 今回の処刑はこちら！

name: Merry
text:
処刑といえばこれ！
オーソドックスな*ギロチン*です！

name: Merry
text:
しかも！
このギロチンは特注品で、ギロチンの刃がゆっくりと落ちてきます！

name: Me
text: え？

name: Merry
text:
さぁ！
ジリジリとした*恐怖*と、ゆっくりと切られる*苦しみ*を存分に味わってくださいね！

name: Me
text: いやだ…。

name: Me
text: い、いやだ！！！！
俺の体は力づくで、ギロチン台に固定されてしまった。

name: Merry
text: それではギロチンスタートです！
ガタガタガタ
ギロチンの刃がゆっくりと降りて来る音が聞こえる。

name: Merry
text: 首まであと5メートル！

name: Merry
text: 3メートル！

name: Merry
text: 1メートル！

name: Merry
text: 30センチ！
感じたことのない恐怖で、頭がおかしくなりそうだ。

name: Merry
text: 10センチ！
俺は、目を閉じて、歯を食いしばった。
数秒後。
俺は意識を失った。

name: Osamu
text: でも、その*手の怪我*…。

name: Osamu
text: 結構ひどいですよね？

name: Osamu
text: まるで何か*刃物で切って*しまったような…。

name: Me
text:
そ、そんなことないですよ！
見た目ほどそんなに*ひどい怪我*ではないですから！

name: Me
text: ご心配かけてすいません…。

name: Osamu
text:
いえ…。
別に*心配*している訳ではなくて…。

name: Me
text: え？

name: Osamu
text: *怪しんでる*んですよ。

name: Osamu
text: あなたが*狼*なんじゃないかって…。

name: Me
text: そ、そんな訳ないじゃないですか！

name: Me
text:
(やばい…。
もし、*隠している凶器*が見つかったら、狼であることがばれてしまう…。)

name: Osamu
text:
では、そのまま両手を上にあげてもらっていいですか？
念のために*身体検査*をさせてください…。

name: Me
text:
べ、べつにいいですけど…。
(やばい…。もう、*オサムさん*をやるしかない！)
俺は両手をあげる振りをして、*凶器を取り出し*、とっさに*オサムさん*に襲いかかった。
しかし、オサムさんはある程度予想していたのだろう。
俺の攻撃をかわし、*隠し持っていた謎の液体*を俺にかけてきたのだ。

name: Me
text: や、やめろ！

name: Osamu
text: *死ね！狼め！*

name: Me
text:
な、なんだこれ？
この液体は？

name: Me
text: あ、あつい！

name: Osamu
text:
ははは！
これはね…*硫酸*だよ！

name: Me
text: 硫酸！？

name: Osamu
text: 君が僕を殺そうとした罰だからね！

name: Osamu
text: *自業自得*だ！
そういうと*オサムさん*は、残りの*硫酸*を俺にふりかけてきた。

name: Me
text: ちくしょう…。

name: なし
text: 俺は、そのまま意識を失った。

name: Me
text: こ、ここでやらないと…。

name: Me
text: ここで、誰かを*殺さないと*…。

name: Me
text: *狼である俺*が*処刑*されるんだ！

name: Me
text: *覚悟を決めろ*…。
俺は*目をつぶり*、手に持った*鏡の破片*をミサキさんめがけて振り下ろした。
その瞬間だった…。
いきなり後ろから縄のようなものを首にかけられた。
その縄は俺の首に食い込み、締め付ける。

name: Me
text: い、息ができない…。
俺は、*もがき*ながらその首を締めている*犯人*に抵抗しようとした。
しかし、抵抗虚しく*意識が薄れ*、身体の力が入らなくなってきた…。

name: Me
text: (でも…。一体誰が何の目的で…？)

name: Me
text: (狼は…俺なのに…。)
結局俺はその*犯人の正体*を見ることなく意識を失ってしまった…。

name: Chie
text: そ、そんな本には*興味*ありません…。

name: Chie
text: 読みたい本はYouで探しますから…。

name: Me
text:
ちょっと待って！
そっちは…！！

name: Chie
text: *邪魔する*とさすがの私も怒りますよ！
彼女はすごい力で俺を押しのけた。

name: Chie
text: えっと…！確かこの辺に…！

name: Me
text:
そ、そこは！
やめろ！

name: Chie
text: きゃーっ！！

name: Chie
text: こ、これは*オサムさん*！？

name: Chie
text: あ、あなた*オサムさん*を殺したの？

name: Kou
text: 何があったんだ？

name: Kou
text: こ、これは…。

name: Chie
text: 彼が、ここに*オサムさん*の遺体を隠していたの！

name: Me
text:
こ、これは俺じゃない！
俺は*狼*じゃないんだ！

name: Maki
text:
さっき*私を本棚から遠ざけ*させたのも、
*死体*に気づかせないようにするためだったのね！

name: Me
text:
(こ、こいつ…。
完全に見捨てる気か！？)

name: Kou
text:
おいおい…。
この状況でさすがに*その言い訳*は厳しいんじゃないか？

name: Chie
text: *こ、この殺人鬼！*

name: なし
text: そ、そんな…。

name: なし
text: 俺はそのあとの*狼裁判*であっさりと処刑されてしまった…。

name: Kou
text: お前、本当に何も知らないのか？

name: Me
text: ほ、本当に何も知らないけど…。

name: Kou
text:
本当か？
お前明らかに*表情がこわばっている*ぞ…。

name: Kou
text:
それに…。
お前から*灯油の匂い*がするのは気のせいか？

name: Me
text:
(やばい…。
さっきペットボトルに移したときに*手に灯油がついた*のかもしれない…。)

name: Kou
text: お前、もしかして…。

name: Kou
text: *狼*だな？

name: Me
text: そ、そんなわけないじゃないか！

name: Kou
text: それにお前、その机の中に何か隠しているな？

name: Me
text: (ど、どうしてそんなことまで気づくんだ…？こいつ！)

name: Kou
text: お前の目線が明らかにチラチラとその机を見ているぞ。

name: Kou
text:
どんだけわかりやすいんだ？
お前は？

name: Kou
text: おい！その*机の中*を見せてみろ！

name: Me
text: や、やめろ！

name: Kou
text:
ふーん…。
これは何だ？

name: Me
text:
え、えーっと…。
これは…。
そのあと俺は尋問され、図書室に隠した*オサムさんの遺体*も見つけられてしまった。
怪しい行動をしていた俺は言い逃れできるはずもなく、*狼裁判で処刑*されてしまった…。

name: Me
text: べ、別にこれは何でも…。

name: Rintarou
text: もしかして…*鏡で手を切った*とか？♪

name: Me
text: (こいつ…。もしかして、俺の行動をみてたのか…？)

name: Me
text: 突然何言ってるんだよ！

name: Me
text: (や、やばい…。もしこいつにバレてたら、*俺が狼だということ*もみんなに知られてしまう…。)

name: Me
text: (今、この場でこいつを*殺して*おいた方がいいのか…。)

name: Me
text: (ま、迷っている暇はない！)
俺は武器庫にあった*サバイバルナイフ*を取り、リンタロウに襲いかかった…。
グサッ

name: Me
text: ど、どうして…。
襲いかかったはずの*Youの腹部*に、大きな包丁が突き刺さっていた…。

name: Rintarou
text: これは*正当防衛*だからね♪

name: Me
text: お、お前*俺が狼だということ*…知っていたのか？

name: Rintarou
text:
さぁ？
どうだろうね？

name: なし
text: 俺は、そのまま意識を失った…。

name: Me
text: 俺のカードは…*羊*だった。

name: Me
text:
よかった…。
今回俺は…*狼*じゃない…。

name: Me
text:
でも、*油断*はできない…。
残りの人数はわずか。

name: Me
text: それはつまり、*殺される可能性*も上がっているということだ…。

name: Merry
text: あ！あと*一つ忘れて*いました！

name: Misaki
text: 突然どうしたん？

name: Merry
text: 私からの*ボーナスチャンス*です！

name: Ritsu
text:
*ボーナスチャンス*…？
何それ？

name: Merry
text: コレです！

name: Chie
text: これは一体…。

name: Merry
text: この中には脱出するのに*とっても役立つもの*が入っています！

name: Misaki
text: とても*役立つもの*？

name: Ritsu
text: マジで！？

name: Merry
text: でもこの箱は*簡単には開かない*ので頑張ってくださいね！
その箱をよく見ると箱には何か*特殊な鍵*が付いている。
そしてMerryは*どこかへ*消えてしまった…。

name: Ritsu
text: 一体何が入ってんだ？

name: Kou
text: あの羊の人形は「ここから*出るのに役立つもの*」と言っていた。

name: Kou
text: おそらく、このゲームの*真相*に関わるものか、*新しい情報*だと俺は思う…。

name: Rintarou
text: 僕も、そう思うな♪

name: Misaki
text: じゃあみんなでこの*箱の謎*を解いてみようよ…。
俺たちは*協力*して、その箱を開けることになった。

name: Misaki
text: あ、あの…。

name: Me
text:
俺を*殺そう*としたのか…？
ということは*君が*…。

name: Misaki
text: ご、ごめん…。

name: Kou
text: *何の騒ぎ*だ？
騒ぎを聞きつけて、みんなが*教室に集まってきた*。

name: Kou
text:
お前…。
*殺すのを失敗*したのか？

name: Chie
text:
ミサキちゃん…。
あなたとだけは*友達*になれると思ったのに…。

name: Kou
text:
これで*狼*はこいつで決まりだ。
まさしく*現行犯*だ。

name: Rintarou
text: 殺すのを*ミス*るなんて*ドジっこ*だね♪

name: Me
text: ど、どうしてよりによって*俺を殺そう*と…？

name: Misaki
text: そ、それは…。

name: Merry
text:
おや！？
殺すのを*失敗*してしまったんですか？

name: Kou
text:
あぁ。
こいつが*今回の狼*で確定だ。

name: Kou
text: もう*狼裁判の必要もない*だろう？

name: Ritsu
text:
見事な*現行犯*だからなー。
ミサキちゃん！*ドンマイ *！

name: Misaki
text: あ…あ…。

name: Merry
text: まぁ、それもそうですね…。

name: Merry
text:
じゃあ、みなさん！
突然ですが、ここで*簡易的な狼裁判*を開始します！

name: Merry
text: 今回の*狼*は*ミサキさん*と言うことでよろしいですか？

name: Kou
text: もちろんだ。

name: Ritsu
text: 異議なーし！

name: Chie
text: *バイバイ*。ミサキさん…。

name: Rintarou
text: まぁ、さすがに*現行犯*だしね♪

name: Merry
text: ではみなさん*ミサキさんが狼*ということでいいですね！

name: Merry
text: それでは、*処刑を開始*します！

name: Misaki
text: いやや！*死にたくない*！
『処刑のアニメ』

name: Merry
text: 無事*処刑が完了*しました！

name: Kou
text:
ふん。*バカな女*だ。
殺人を*失敗*するなんて。

name: Me
text:
おい…。
そこまで言わなくていいだろ…。

name: Kou
text:
なにムキになってんだ、お前？
あの女のこと*少し気になってた*のか？

name: Me
text: *死んだ人のこと*をそこまで言う必要ないだろ！

name: Rintarou
text:
ちょっと！2人とも！
*ケンカ*はダメだよ♪

name: Me
text: ご、ごめん…。

name: Kou
text: チッ…。

name: Chie
text: で、でもこれで、次の*脱出の扉*は開くんですよね？

name: Merry
text:
はい！
*イレギュラー*でしたが、*狼が処刑された*ことに変わりはないので！

name: Chie
text:
よ、よかった…。
早く*脱出の扉*を開きましょう！

name: Ritsu
text: お前もちょっとは*ミサキちゃんが死んだことを悲しめ*よー！

name: Chie
text:
そ、そうだっわね…。
か、*悲しい*…。

name: Ritsu
text:
うわー。
*嘘*くせー。

name: Me
text: (こいつら…。ミサキさんが*死んだことなど*全く気にもしていない…。)

name: Me
text:
(でも俺も…。
こいつらと*あまり変わらない*か…。)

name: Me
text: (俺も、*Youが生き残る事*ばかり考えている…。)

name: Wolfe
text: それでは次の*脱出の扉*を解放する。

name: Merry
text: 次こそ外に出られるかもしれません！

name: Me
text: ガチャ

name: なし
text: (扉が開いた先にはまた*部屋*があった。)

name: なし
text: (こ、これは…。)
(そこは*電車の車内*のような奇妙な部屋だった…。)

name: Chie
text:
もういや…。
*今度こそ出られる*と思ったのに…。

name: Rintarou
text: この部屋は…*電車*みたいだね♪

name: Kou
text:
それにこれは…。
人間？いや、*羊*…？

name: なし
text: そこには*羊のような人形*が数体立っており、向こうの*車両に続くドア*の方を見つめている。

name: Me
text: (こ、この光景は…。)

name: Me
text: (見たことがある…。)

name: Me
text: (*5年前*にあったあの事件…。)

name: Me
text:
(でも、誰が*何のため*に…。
こんなこと…。)

name: Chie
text:
ん？
な、何か落ちてますね…。

name: Chie
text:
「この光景を見て、何か*思い出す*か？
それとも*気づく*か？」

name: Rintarou
text: *ゲームの真相*にどんどん近づいているみたいだね…。

name: Kou
text: この光景…。つまり*電車の車内*…。

name: Kou
text: そして、*向こうの車両*を覗き込む羊たち…。

name: Rintarou
text: あ！この人形、ボタンがついてる♪

name: Rintarou
text: 押したらどうなるのかな♪

name: Rintarou
text: エイッ！

name: Chie
text: そ、そんな急に押したら*何が起きる*か…。
「ザザ…ザザ…」

name: Kou
text: なんだ？*音*がなってるぞ？

name: Me
text: どうやら人形のどこかに*スピーカー*があるようだ…。

name: 羊の人形
text: 「こ、こないで…。*Yuuya*がくる…。*Yuuya*がくるよ…。」

name: 羊の人形
text: 「ザザ…ザザ…」

name: 羊の人形
text: 「だから…*見捨てよう*…しょうがない…」

name: 羊の人形
text: 「ブツッ」
そういうと*音は途切れて*しまった。

name: Kou
text:
*Yuuyaがくる*？
そう言ってたよな…。

name: Kou
text: よく見るとこの羊たちは、電車の車両*連結部分のドア*が開かないようにしているな…。

name: Kou
text: ということは向こうの車両に*Yuuya*がいるのか？

name: Chie
text: でも、*ドアは作り物*で向こうに空間なんてないですね…。

name: Kou
text: ということは、これは*何かの状況を再現*しているのか？

name: Kou
text: 「電車」…。「見捨てよう」…。「Yuuyaがくる」…。

name: Kou
text: *まさか…。*

name: Rintarou
text: ん？もしかして*何か気づいた*の？

name: Kou
text: い、いや…。

name: Rintarou
text:
えー教えてよー！
みんな*気になる*よね…♪

name: Chie
text:
き、気になります…。
わ、私は*さっぱり*なんで…。

name: Ritsu
text: *こ、これって…。*

name: Chie
text: え？リツさんも*何か気づいた*んですか…？

name: Me
text: (*あの2人*も何か気づいたようだ…。)

name: Me
text:
(この*電車内の光景*…。
俺も*知っているぞ*…。)

name: Me
text: (あの*血のついた服*を見つけた時も思ったが…。)

name: Me
text: (やっぱりこの狼ゲームは、*あの事件に関係している*のは確実だ…。)

name: Me
text: (じゃあ、ここに集められた人たちの*共通点*って…。)

name: Me
text: Youの*記憶*が徐々にこの*ゲームの核心*に近づいて行くのを感じたその時だった…。

name: Wolfe
text: それでは*次の狼*を決定する…。

name: Rintarou
text: もー！またやるの？

name: Chie
text: もう、いい加減*これで最後*にしてほしいです…。

name: Me
text: (とりあえず今は、まず*目の前の脅威*から生き延びなければ…。)
カードをめくるアニメ5

name: Me
text: このままじゃ*殺される*…。

name: Me
text: ま、まずい…。
ミサキさんの手には*俺が植物室に隠した、鏡の破片*が握られている…。

name: Misaki
text: 死んで！

name: Me
text: や、やばい！
俺はミサキさんに刺される直前になんとか*彼女の攻撃を回避*した…。
ガシャン
ミサキさんはそのままの勢いで転倒してしまった…。

name: Me
text: 危なかった…。

name: Me
text: もう少しで刺し殺されるところだった…。
俺の足元には彼女が落とした*凶器*が転がっていた…。
俺はとっさにその*鏡の破片*を手にとった…。

name: Misaki
text: あ、あの…。

name: Me
text: 君は*俺を殺そうとした*のか？

name: Misaki
text: ほ、ほんまに…ごめん…。

name: Me
text:
よくも…。
よくも俺を殺そうとしたな！
俺は*怒り*に任せて、*ナイフを振り上げた*。
その瞬間だった…。
バキューン

name: なし
text: 突然、背後から銃声が鳴り響いた。

name: Me
text: え？
Youの胸のあたりから、血がにじみ出てきている。

name: Me
text: い、一体誰が…。
後ろを振り向くと、*俺を拳銃で撃った人物*が立っていた。
ど、どうして*お前*が…。
そのあとすぐに俺は*意識を失った*…。

name: Me
text: (ということは俺以外の*4人*のうちの誰かが*狼*か…。)

name: Me
text:
いずれにせよ…この人数しかいない…。
殺される可能性は*かなり高い*…。

name: Me
text: 正直、もう精神的消耗がかなり激しい…。

name: Me
text: 俺は、*言葉少なく*その場を離れて廊下に出た…。

name: Me
text:
そのとき俺は*ひどく疲れていた*。
少しでもいいから*横になりたい*と思った。

name: Me
text: (どこかに隠れて、*少しだけ眠ろう*…。)
俺は*図書室の本棚の影*に隠れて、*少し仮眠*をとることにした。

name: Me
text:
(しかし、*電車でドアを閉める羊*たち…。
あの光景はやはり*見た事がある*…。)

name: Me
text: (するとこの*狼ゲームの正体*は…。)

name: Me
text: (あの*事件*に関係しているのか…。)

name: Me
text: そんな事を考えながら、俺は*眠り*に落ちてしまった。
やめて！やめてよ！

name: 女子小学生
text: もう誰かあいつら止めたら？

name: 女子小学生
text:
さすがにやりすぎでしょ？
*泣いてる*じゃん。

name: 男子小学生A
text: お前、最近新しい*転校生の友達*できたからって調子に乗ってるだろ？

name: 男子小学生B
text: おい！こいつ*泣いてる*ぜ！

name: 男子小学生C
text: ハハハハ。

name: 男子小学生A
text:
ん？
お前の*唯一の友達の転校生*がきたぞ！

name: 男子小学生A
text:
おい！*転校生*！
お前、こいつの友達なんだろ？

name: 男子小学生B
text: じゃあ、お前も*一緒に俺たちと遊ぶか*？

name: 昔のYou
text: え、えっと…。

name: 昔のYou
text: 俺は…。

name: 昔のYou
text: (どうしよう…。)

name: 昔のYou
text:
ちょ、ちょっと*用事*があるから…。
またね…。

name: 男子小学生B
text: あーあ。*見捨てられちまった*な！

name: 男子小学生C
text: せっかくできた*唯一の友達*だったのに！

name: 男子小学生A
text: ハハハハ。

name: Me
text:
また*あの夢*だ…。
俺の*小学校の頃*の記憶…。

name: Me
text: 子供の頃から、この*夢*を何回見ただろうか？

name: Me
text: 今でも*トラウマ*のようにYouの中にある記憶。

name: Me
text: あの日以来、俺は彼と話をしなくなり、結局*他の友達*を作り、そこで遊ぶようになった。

name: Me
text: 彼はまた、*1人ぼっち*でいじめられる日々が続いた。

name: Me
text: その後も何度か彼が*いじめられている現場*に出くわしたが、俺は目をそらした。

name: Me
text: だって…。*怖かった*から。

name: Me
text: 彼はじっといじめに耐えながら、*俺の方*を見ていた。

name: Me
text:
そして、それから*半年*ぐらいたったとき…。
その子から急に*家に電話がきた*。

name: 昔のYou
text: もしもし…。
僕、いじめられて*辛かった*…。
でも、それは*耐えられた*んだ。
でも、*友達に裏切られる辛さ*は耐えられなかった…。

こんな*気持ち*になるなら…。
君と会わなければよかったよ…。

name: Me
text: そういうと、一方的に*電話が切れた*。

name: Me
text: 次の日、彼は*学校の屋上から飛び降りて自殺*した。

name: Me
text: 俺が*小学校4年生*の頃だ…。

name: Me
text: この経験が、その後ずっと俺を*苦しめる*ことになる。

name: Me
text:
「俺は、*逃げた*…。」
その事実が心に*くらい影*を落とした。

name: Me
text: 勇気も出ずに、*友達を見捨てて*逃げた…。

name: Me
text: それ以来、俺は*逃げる*と言うことに敏感になった。

name: Me
text: そして、全ての*不安や、恐怖*から逃げるようになってしまった。

name: Me
text: それは*年齢を重ねても*変わらなかった…。

name: Me
text: そして、*あの事件*の時も…俺はいつも通り*逃げた*んだ…。

name: Me
text: どれくらい寝ただろうか？

name: Me
text: 俺は*眠気をさます為*、ゆっくりと立ち上がった。

name: Me
text: すると…。

name: Me
text: 目の前に、*リンタロウ*が立っていた。

name: Me
text:
う、うわ！
なんだよ？

name: Rintarou
text: *驚かしちゃって*ごめんね♪

name: Me
text: (こいつまさか*俺を殺そう*として…。)

name: Rintarou
text:
僕は*狼*じゃないよ…。
もし*本当に狼だったら*寝ている君を*殺す*だろう？

name: Me
text:
それはそうか…。
で、何か用？

name: Rintarou
text: んーとね…。

name: Rintarou
text: 君ってさ、前回…。

name: Rintarou
text: *狼*だったよね？

name: Me
text: な…なんだよ*突然*…。

name: Rintarou
text: 君が*凶器*を持って、*図書室*に忍び込むのを見てたのさ。

name: Me
text: 全部見てたのか…？

name: Rintarou
text:
うん。
けれど、まさか*他にも狼*がいたなんてびっくりしたよね？

name: Rintarou
text: でも*ラッキー*だったね♪

name: Rintarou
text: 勇気が出なくて*ウジウジ*している間に、*他の狼*が先に殺してくれた…。

name: Me
text:
な、何が言いたいんだよ…。
俺を*脅してる*つもりか？

name: Me
text: それに全部見てたんならなぜ前回の*狼裁判の時*に何も言わなかったんだよ…。

name: Rintarou
text:
それは…。
*おあいこ*だからかな♪

name: Me
text:
*おあいこ*…？
どういう意味だ…？

name: Rintarou
text: 俳優のタクヤさんが殺された夜、*君は狼に追いかけられた*って言ってたよね？

name: Me
text: う、うん…。

name: Rintarou
text: そのときの狼裁判で「*利き手*が違う」と訴えていただろう？

name: Rintarou
text: あの時はちょっと*焦った*よ…。

name: Me
text:
*焦った*って…。
と言うことはお前が…。

name: Rintarou
text: タクヤさんを殺した*狼は僕*なんだ♪

name: Rintarou
text: ちなみに、シャツを盗んで燃やしたのも全部僕の*偽装工作*だよ♪

name: Me
text:
お、お前…。
*人を殺した*のか…？

name: Rintarou
text:
え？
そうだけど…？

name: Me
text: *罪悪感*とかないのか…？

name: Rintarou
text:
ハハッ♪
ちょっと*笑わせないで*よ…。

name: Rintarou
text: 君だって、*羊を殺そう*としてたじゃないか？

name: Rintarou
text: *いい人*ぶるなよ…。

name: Rintarou
text: キミは*運が良かった*だけじゃないか♪

name: Rintarou
text: なかなか*殺す勇気*がなくて、*ウジウジ*してたらマキさんが先に殺してくれた♪

name: Rintarou
text: そんなキミに*罪悪感*とか語る権利なんてないだろう？

name: Me
text: そ、それは…。

name: Rintarou
text: お互いここまで*生き残ってきた*んだから、*仲良くしようよ*…♪

name: Rintarou
text: それに今回*君は狼じゃない*みたいだし♪

name: Rintarou
text: *顔*を見ればわかるよ…。

name: Rintarou
text: 君は…*羊*だ♪

name: Rintarou
text: *怯えきった顔*をしているからね♪

name: Rintarou
text:
まあそんなことより、もう*朝*だよ♪
リビングに行こうよ…。

name: Rintarou
text: 狼が*誰かを殺している*かもよ？

name: Rintarou
text: 確かめに行こうよ♪

name: Me
text: (こいつ…一体どう言うつもりなんだ…。)

name: Me
text: 俺たちは無言のまま*リビング*に向かった…。

name: Ritsu
text:
げー。
お前ら*生きてたの*かよ…。

name: Kou
text: これで、*５人中４人*が揃ったか…。

name: Rintarou
text: あとは*チエちゃん*だけだね♪

name: Ritsu
text:
えー。
もしあいつが殺されてたら*女はワタシ1人*？

name: Me
text: ま、まだ*殺された*と決まった訳じゃ…。

name: Kou
text:
そうだな。
あいつはかなり*臆病*だからな…。

name: Rintarou
text:
そうだね♪
どこかに*隠れているのかも*しれない♪

name: Kou
text: じゃあ、みんなであいつを*探す*か…。

name: Rintarou
text:
そうだね♪
もし*死んでたとしても*早く見つけてあげなくちゃ♪

name: Ritsu
text: めんどー。

name: Me
text: 俺たちは*チエさんを探す為*に探索することにした…。

name: Me
text: そこにはイスに*力なく座っているチエさん*がいた。

name: Ritsu
text:
し、*死んでる*な…。
狼に殺されちゃったかー。

name: Rintarou
text: でも、この部屋は*内側から鍵*がかかっていたんだよ？

name: Kou
text: そうだな、では*密室*だったということか…。

name: Rintarou
text:
あれ♪
チエちゃんの*膝の上*に何かあるね♪

name: Ritsu
text:
あ！ほんとだー。
何か書いてあるな。

name: Ritsu
text:
私が狼。耐えられない。
前から*死のう*って思ってたし、*自殺*しよう。

name: Kou
text:
これは…。
*遺書*？

name: Rintarou
text: じゃあ、チエちゃんは*自殺*しちゃったってこと？

name: Ritsu
text: あ！それに*コレ*！

name: Kou
text:
これは、*毒のビン*だな…。
これを飲んで*自殺*したってところか…。

name: Ritsu
text: まあ、元から*いつ死んでもおかしくない*ようなヤツだったし…。

name: Ritsu
text: 狼になった*重圧に耐えられなかった*んじゃね？

name: Me
text:
(ここまできて*自殺*なんてするか…？
でもチエさんのことだ…*行動の予測は難しい*か…？)

name: Kou
text: 狼が*自殺*ってことは…*ゲームはどうなる*んだ？

name: Kou
text:
おい！Merry！Wolfe！
どこかで*この様子*を見ているんだろう？

name: Kou
text: この場合、*ゲームはどうなる*んだ？

name: Merry
text: 狼が*自殺した場合*でも、その人を含めた*狼裁判*をちゃーんと行います！

name: Merry
text: それに…チエさんが*自殺したとは限りません*よね？

name: Merry
text: もしかしたら、*狼の偽装工作*かもしれませんよ〜！

name: Rintarou
text: え…でも*密室*だったし、もう*自殺で確定*でいいんじゃないかな♪

name: Ritsu
text: まぁ、でもMerryの言うことも*一理ある*なぁ…。

name: Kou
text: じゃあ、狼裁判は通常通り、*12時間後に開かれる*と言うことだな。

name: Merry
text:
はい！
そこで、やはり*チエさんが狼*だったと思えば、チエさんを*狼として選んで*ください！

name: Merry
text: その、場合はすでに死んでますから、処刑はできませんが…。

name: Merry
text: 本当にチエさんが*狼*だったら、*脱出の扉*が開きます！

name: Me
text:
(やはりここまできて…。
急に彼女が*自殺するなんて思えない*よな…。)

name: Me
text: (この違和感は、以前の*タケオさん*を*処刑した時*にも感じた…。)

name: Me
text: (簡単に思い込まないほうがいい。)

name: Me
text: (*念を入れて*探索してみよう…。)

name: Wolfe
text: それでは*第4回の狼裁判*を始めるぞ。

name: Merry
text: これで*残り4人*になってしまいました。

name: Merry
text:
最初はあんなに*人数が多くて*賑やかだったのに…。
悲しいですね…。

name: Ritsu
text: いい加減、*次こそ外*に出られるんじゃないか？

name: Merry
text: それは、*狼を処刑*してみないとわかりませんね！

name: Me
text: (チエさんが*物置の密室*で、*自殺*した状態で発見された…。)

name: Me
text: (しかし、探索の中で、*遺書の筆跡が違った*り、*物置に続く通気口が見つかった*りと不審な点が多い。)

name: Me
text: (おそらく、チエさんは*狼に殺された*んだろう…。)

name: Me
text: (しかし、今俺が*持っている証拠だけ*では*誰が狼なのか*は特定できないし…。)

name: Me
text: (裁判の中で、うまく*狼がボロ*を出してくれればいいのだが…。)

name: Wolfe
text: それでは*狼裁判を開廷*する。

name: Kou
text: チエの自殺は、*リツによる偽装*だったと言うことか…。

name: Rintarou
text: *密室*を作り出すなんて、リツちゃんすごいね♪

name: Ritsu
text:
くそっ…。くそっ！
あとちょっとだったのに！

name: Kou
text: まぁ、その*密室トリック*こそが狼を特定する証拠にもなってしまったんだけどな…。

name: Merry
text:
そ、それでは、みなさん！
*今回の狼はリツさん*と言うことでいいですね？

name: Ritsu
text:
いやだ…。
*死にたく*ない！！

name: Ritsu
text: お前ら！*絶対に許さねー*からな！

name: Merry
text: それでは*リツさんの処刑*を開始します！
『処刑のアニメ』

name: Merry
text: *処刑が完了*しました！

name: Merry
text: ワニにぱっくり食べられちゃいましたね！

name: Rintarou
text: あとちょっとで*渡り切りそうだった*のにね…。

name: Kou
text: これで*残るは3人*か…。

name: Merry
text:
これは、これは…。
男だけが残る*むさ苦しい展開*ですね！

name: Merry
text: それでは彼女が*本当に狼*だったのか、答え合わせをしましょう！

name: GM2
text: ドゥルドゥルドゥルドゥルのアニメ

name: Merry
text: お見事！

name: Merry
text: 彼女が*狼*でした！

name: Merry
text: みなさんご存知だと思いますが、*チエちゃん*はよく*物置*に引きこもっていました。

name: Merry
text: そこで、リツさんは*物置の扉*が開かないように*外側から細工*。

name: Merry
text: そして、*部屋の中の通気口*から、*洗剤*を混ぜて*毒ガス*を*発生*させ、物置に充満させた。

name: Merry
text: さらに、そのとき、*武器庫の方の通気口*には*ガムテープをはり*、密閉。

name: Merry
text: *物置のみにガスが行く*ようにしました。

name: Merry
text: チエちゃんはその*ガスを吸って*しまい、死亡。

name: Merry
text: そして、リツちゃんはその部屋に*ガスマスク*をつけて、*通気口から侵入*。

name: Merry
text: *内側から鍵*をかけました。

name: Merry
text: さらに、*遺書や毒のビン*などを使い、*自殺したように*見せかけました。

name: Merry
text: そして最後に、通気口を使い*武器庫*に戻らなければいけませんが、*通気口が見えたまま*では*せっかくの密室トリック*も台無しです。

name: Merry
text: そこで、リツさんは大胆にも*通気口の前*を*棚で塞ぐ*ことを思いつきます！

name: Merry
text: まず彼女は、*棚の中の荷物*を他の棚に移し、*棚を軽く*しました。

name: Merry
text: そして、棚の足に*ヒモ*を結び…。

name: Merry
text: そして、Youは*再び通気口*の中に入りました。

name: Merry
text: その中から*ヒモ*を引っ張り、*棚を通気口の前*まで持ってきた。

name: Merry
text: そして、ヒモを*棚の足からほどいて回収*し、*通気口*を通り*隣の部屋に戻った*と言うわけです♪

name: Merry
text: これで*密室が完成*し、*自殺に見せかけたトリック*が完成したと言うわけですね！

name: Rintarou
text: この短時間に*ここまでの仕掛け*をするなんてリツさんすごーい♪

name: Kou
text: *ずる賢い*あいつが考えそうなトリックだな…。

name: Merry
text: それでは、*脱出の扉*が開きます！

name: Merry
text:
私が言うのも何ですが…。
*そろそろ出れる*んじゃないですかね…。

name: Merry
text:
それでは、*脱出の扉*！
オープン！
ガチャ

name: Me
text: これは…。

name: Rintarou
text: ドアの先に、また*ドア*があるね〜？

name: Kou
text: *LAST DOOR*と書いてあるな。

name: Merry
text:
おめでとうございます♪
とうとう*たどり着きました*ね！

name: Wolfe
text: このドアが最後の*脱出の扉*だ。

name: Wolfe
text: これを開くと*外に出ること*ができる。

name: Kou
text: ちょっとまて。

name: Merry
text: はい？

name: Kou
text: 残りはもう*3人*しかいない。

name: Kou
text: 3人では狼ゲームは*成立しない*んじゃないか？

name: Kou
text: 狼が残りのうちどちらかを殺したら、狼裁判では*2人*しか残らない。

name: Kou
text: *2人*になれば、*投票は必ず1対1で割れてしまう*。

name: Kou
text: これでは、*狼裁判は成立しない*だろう？

name: Rintarou
text:
確かにそうだね♪
ね？どうするの？

name: Merry
text: そこはもちろん考えていますよ！

name: Wolfe
text: 今から残りのお前らには…。

name: Wolfe
text: *狼デスマッチ*をしてもらう。

name: Me
text: お、*狼デスマッチ*！？

name: Kou
text: なんだそれは…？

name: Rintarou
text: なんだか、すごそう…♪

name: Merry
text: ルールは簡単！

name: Merry
text: 残った*3人*には…。

name: Merry
text: シンプルに、*殺し合い*をしてもらいます！

name: Merry
text: そして、最後に*生き残った1人*が脱出できるという*斬新なルール*です！

name: Me
text:
そ、そんな…。
*殺し合い*をするだと…？

name: Merry
text: さらにさらに*私からのサービス*です！

name: Me
text: するといきなり目の前に*ピストル*が置かれた。

name: Me
text: それぞれ*一丁ずつ*あるようだ。

name: Wolfe
text: 弾は*6発*しか入っていないので注意しろ。

name: Me
text: まじか…。

name: Me
text: 俺は目の前に置かれた*ピストル*を手に取った。

name: Kou
text: ここまで来て結局出れるのは*1人だけ*と言うオチか…。

name: Rintarou
text:
最後に*殺し合い*だなんて…。
せっかくみんなと*仲良くなったのに*…♪

name: Merry
text:
そして最後に！
今から*数字の書いたカード*を引いてもらいます！

name: Merry
text: その*数字の順*にこの部屋を出てもらいます！

name: Merry
text: この部屋を出た時点から、*狼デスマッチ*のスタートです♪
カードをめくるアニメ6
俺の推理は納得してもらえず、逆に俺に対する疑惑が上がってしまった。

name: Ritsu
text: 何かお前、おかしいぞ！

name: Me
text: べ、別に何もおかしいことなんてないけど…。

name: リンタロウ
text:
確かに今日の君はおかしいね♪
言っていることが*めちゃくちゃ*だよ♪

name: リンタロウ
text: どうしてそんな*変なこと*ばかりいうのかな？

name: Ritsu
text: その理由は一つしかないでしょう？

name: Ritsu
text: そいつが*狼で、チエを殺した*んでしょ？

name: Me
text:
違う！
